rosary beads.examine_text: You see the beads are made of polished wood, equally spaced on a thin silver chain. There is a small, intricately detailed crucifix at the end.

Timothy.name: Timothy
Timothy.description: A lanky teenager with a voice like a bell, Timothy's attire mostly consists of loose fit jeans and the church's choir T-shirts.
Timothy.persona: Hey there, I'm Timothy but people usually call me Tim. Singing in the choir? It was just for fun at first but now, it's more than that..
Timothy.goal: My main goal is to nail the solo in the upcoming Easter service – I've never had such a big part before.

Pitch Pipe.name: Pitch Pipe
Pitch Pipe.description: A small, shiny pitch pipe lying on the table.
Pitch Pipe.examine_text: It's a small yet exquisitely crafted pitch pipe. When blown into, it produces a perfect middle C. Useful for setting the key for a choir performance. It seems slightly warmed from being used recently.

Sheet Music.name: Sheet Music
Sheet Music.description: Pile of sheet music resting on the table.
Sheet Music.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, one can see the melody of a new song written in beautiful notation. This paper holds so much emotion and effort by the choir. A small note in the corner indicates it's Timothy's copy.

Green Choir Robe.name: Green Choir Robe
Green Choir Robe.description: A fresh green and white choir robe hanging in the closet.
Green Choir Robe.examine_text: This robe is made of flowing white material with green accents highlighting the edges and lining the cuff of the sleeves. It's been meticulously cared for. It's Timothy's - his name is etched on a small name tag sewn into the collar.

locations.name: Prayer Bell
locations.description: This is a semi-outdoors location with low stone walls, a great view of the surrounding town, creaky worn out floor, and a very large brass bell.  There is a long rope hanging down the center that one can grab and proceed to ring the bell to call people to service.
locations.background: Church assistants come here to call worshippers to service.  It can be a bit of a pain as one advances in years and needs to make the trek up.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving northward from the Prayer Bell, you approach the Stained Glass Room, where the air fills with a profound sense of divine beauty listening to the silent stories narrated by the colourful glass figures.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending down towards the sacristy, you navigate through a dimly lit stone staircase, the hallowed atmosphere embraces you as you pass by rows of shelved relics and decorative worship tools casting long shadows.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending upward, you traverse a narrow passage, covertly tucked behind an austere wardrobe. The journey is an eerie experience, a testament to the church's history and the secrets it has safeguarded.

Large Brass Bell.name: Large Brass Bell
Large Brass Bell.description: A big bell made of brass used to call people to service
Large Brass Bell.examine_text: The large brass bell gleams in the sunlight, resounding powerfully when struck. There are decorations and scriptures adorning its surface, becoming testament to its age and significance. The bell displays the years of its use, with a polished sheen that comes from countless rings.

Creaky Floor.name: Creaky Floor
Creaky Floor.description: An old wooden floor that creaks under pressure
Creaky Floor.examine_text: Years of weather and use have aged this floor. The wooden planks are worn and uneven, some loose and others firm. Each step leads to a different sound, creating a melody of creaks that echo with the church's longevity.

Bell rope.name: Bell rope
Bell rope.description: A long and sturdy rope tied to the bell, used to ring the bell
Bell rope.examine_text: The rope has a rugged texture, made from years of tugging and bell ringing. It's quite long, stretching all the way to the top of the bell tower. It feels strong, reliable, capably bearing the bell's weight over all these years.

Brother Thomas.name: Brother Thomas
Brother Thomas.description: An elderly, kind-faced monk with a shining bald head and a long grey beard, dressed in simple brown robes.
Brother Thomas.persona: I am a humble servant of the church, spending most of my time in prayer and reflection. My task is to ring the bells, calling our congregation to service.
Brother Thomas.goal: To fulfill my duties and live a life of meaningful service to our congregation.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A string of carefully handcrafted wooden beads.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: The beads are well-worn and smooth, evidence of years of prayer.  Each bead is a testament to Brother Thomas's dedication and commitment to his religious duties.

Holy Book.name: Holy Book
Holy Book.description: A thick, heavy volume, covered in worn-out, brown leather.
Holy Book.examine_text: The pages are yellowed with age and filled with solemn, reverent words and intricate drawings. Brother Thomas's hurried annotations are scribbled in the margins, hinting at his deep understanding and study of the sacred texts.

Candle Stub.name: Candle Stub
Candle Stub.description: A small piece of a previously larger white candle.
Candle Stub.examine_text: Most of this candle has been burned away, and only a short piece remains. It's mottled with droplets of hardened wax and scorch marks, but still emits a slight fragrance of beeswax. It speaks to long hours spent in prayer or reading the Holy book.

Sister Mary.name: Sister Mary
Sister Mary.description: A spry old nun, with white hair neatly tucked under her coif. She's dressed in the traditional black and white habit and her eyes twinkle with a joy for life.
Sister Mary.persona: I find immense joy in serving the church and ringing the bell is part of my duties. It's a bit of a climb, but it keeps me fit!
Sister Mary.goal: To bring people together in prayer and keep the traditions of the church alive.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A beautiful, old rosary made of wooden beads and a small metal crucifix.
Rosary.examine_text: The rosary has been well-used over many years, but it is still in good condition. The beads are smooth, darkened over time and with use. The crucifix is simply designed, and holds a comforting weight in your hands.

Key to the church.name: Key to the church
Key to the church.description: A small, heavy iron key with an ornate handle.
Key to the church.examine_text: The key's teeth seem complex and intricate, an old-fashioned design that you wouldn't easily find. The handle is ornately carved with imagery often found in religious texts. It has the weight of responsibility.

Small crucifix.name: Small crucifix
Small crucifix.description: A simple and small wooden crucifix.
Small crucifix.examine_text: The crucifix is small and simply made. The figure of Christ is carefully shaped and though it is made of wood, the craftsmanship lends it a certain grace.

Brother Andrew.name: Brother Andrew
Brother Andrew.description: A novice monk, tall and lanky, with a mop of curly hair poking from under his hood. He is always found wearing his brown robe and sandals.
Brother Andrew.persona: I am new to this calling, but have wholeheartedly given myself to service. I assist by ringing the bell when it's time for services.
Brother Andrew.goal: To learn from my superiors and serve the church in every way I can.

Monk's Robe.name: Monk's Robe
Monk's Robe.description: A simple and uncomfortable robe made from coarse, brown material.
Monk's Robe.examine_text: On closer examination, the robe seems to have been woven from a rough, raw fabric. There is a small cross embroidered on the chest. It looks like it's designed for functionality and modesty instead of comfort.

Sandals.name: Sandals
Sandals.description: Simple footwear made of sturdy leather straps.
Sandals.examine_text: The sandals exude a minimalist charm with their basic design. The soles are thick and sturdy, wear and tear seemingly unable to make a mark. They're not exactly high fashion, but they spell practicality through and through.

Bell_Rope.name: Bell Rope
Bell_Rope.description: A fairly long rope secured to the large brass bell.
Bell_Rope.examine_text: Drawing closer, you see the years of wear on the braided hemp material, signifying countless services called. The end of the rope appears frayed slightly, a testament to the hands that have pulled it.

locations.name: Church Entryway
locations.description: The church has marble floors and a huge frost window. There are benches made from wood and a big organ can be seen at the front stage. There is gold trim all around the church.
locations.background: This is where everyone comes to pray. It is a place to worship god and have ceremonies.

travel_descriptions.east: As you make your way to the east, you can see the confessional, shrouded in hushed silence and a sense of history, emanating a potent aura of faith and reflection.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading south, your path takes you to the Holy Alter where an ethereal beauty awaits. It is a sanctum aglow with the brilliance of precious metals and the potent energy of deep reverence.
travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping inside, you approach the Church Altar. The journey is accompanied by a hallowed silence that sets the tone, preparing your spirit for the manifestation of the divine.

Marble Bench.name: Marble Bench
Marble Bench.description: A long, sturdy bench crafted from smooth marble.
Marble Bench.examine_text: The bench, cool to the touch, shows signs of wear from countless worshippers finding respite upon it. Small etchings of religious symbols adorn the sides.

Frosted Window.name: Frosted Window
Frosted Window.description: A large window with intricate frost designs.
Frosted Window.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the frost designs morph into biblical scenes, masterfully crafted to catch and refract the soft, diffused light that filters through the window.

Organ.name: Organ
Organ.description: A large organ resting on the stage.
Organ.examine_text: The organ, imposing and grand, bears a dark, polished mahogany finish. Its intricate mechanics are hidden within, and towering pipes ascend towards the high ceiling.

Gold Trim.name: Gold Trim
Gold Trim.description: Gold trims outlining the walls and archways.
Gold Trim.examine_text: The gold trim, elegant and pristine, curves into ornate patterns that speak to the craftsmanship of its makers. It gleams as it catches the light.

Brother Joseph.name: Brother Joseph
Brother Joseph.description: Brother Joseph is elderly, stooping low with a kind smile and a white beard. He's always dressed in traditional monk's robes.
Brother Joseph.persona: I serve the God with my life and help everyone who needs guidance. I always have a few books in my hands ready for a quiet read.
Brother Joseph.goal: To provide spiritual guidance to all who seek him out and maintain peace in the church.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A thick, well-used book full of scriptures, parables, and prayers.
Holy Bible.examine_text: The Bible is bound in rich, cracked leather, and its thin pages seem to crinkle in the quiet of the church. Despite its age, the gold lettering on the cover still manages to catch the light.

Pair of Glasses.name: Pair of Glasses
Pair of Glasses.description: A pair of rounded eyeglasses which Brother Joseph requires for reading.
Pair of Glasses.examine_text: The glasses have thin, gold rims that glisten in the church's ambient light, and the lenses are spotless and clear. A small, neatly folded cloth is kept nearby for cleaning purposes.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A set of holy rosary beads, used for prayer and meditation.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The rosary is made up of small, brown wooden beads, each worn from years of use. They are strung on a durable cord, at the end of which is a small, dark crucifix.

Sister Marie.name: Sister Marie
Sister Marie.description: Sister Marie is a middle-aged woman with red hair hidden beneath her nun's habit. She possesses a friendly, warm gaze and always wears a cross pendant.
Sister Marie.persona: I love tending the church and helping out my brothers and sisters in need. I usually keep some money and a comforting spiritual prayer in my pocket for anyone who might need it.
Sister Marie.goal: To make the church a welcoming place and uphold its tranquillity.

cross_pendant.name: Cross Pendant
cross_pendant.description: A lovely silver cross pendant worn by Sister Marie.
cross_pendant.examine_text: The pendant radiates a peaceful aura, obviously well cared by Sister Marie. Small engravings detail scenes from biblical passages.

wallet.name: Wallet
wallet.examine_text: Although a little weathered, the wallet is still in good condition. Sister Marie would occasionally take some money out of it for charitable causes.

prayer_note.name: Prayer Note
prayer_note.description: A small piece of paper with a prayer written on it.
prayer_note.examine_text: The handwritten prayer seems to comfort and heal the soul. Sister Marie probably carries it around as a token of her faith.

John.name: John
John.description: John is a young man, always found sweeping the church floors. He's tall, has black hair and typically wears blue jeans with a white shirt.
John.persona: I'm the caretaker here, responsible for the upkeep of this wonderful building. I always have my broom, duster and some cleaning liquid handy.
John.goal: To ensure that the church is clean and inviting for all its guests.

broom.name: Broom
broom.description: A long hardwood broom used for cleaning.
broom.examine_text: The broom has a long, polished wooden handle with stiff straw bristles protruding from the bottom. It's well worn, indicating that it's seen plenty of use.

dust_cloth.name: Dust Cloth
dust_cloth.description: A yellow dust cloth for wiping and polishing.
dust_cloth.examine_text: John's faithful companion in the battle against dust. The cloth is yellow, a bit tattered with stains from various cleaning liquids.

bottle_of_cleaning_liquid.name: Bottle of Cleaning Liquid
bottle_of_cleaning_liquid.description: A plastic bottle containing clear cleaning solution with a scent of lemon.
bottle_of_cleaning_liquid.examine_text: This is an unassuming plastic bottle but within it lies John's secret weapon for a pristine church. The label says it's a multi-purpose cleaner with a fresh lemon scent.

locations.name: Next To An Altar
locations.description: A medium length table is covered with a deep red bolt of silk. The edges of the cloth have ornate embroidered gold patterns. A hefty sized ornate cross decorated in diamonds, sapphires, and rubies reflects bits of colored light across the top of the table. Up above, a decorative stained-glass window looms.
locations.background: The altar is the proud centerpiece of the church. The jeweled cross is known throughout the lands, and by itself draws its own share of people to the church. During the daytime, colored light plays across surfaces and faces as the window is purposefully positioned to catch the sun's rays.

travel_descriptions.west: You exit the serene atmosphere surrounding the altar, stepping on the creaking wooden floor, moving towards the dense crowd gathered in the vast Sermon Hall.
travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping away from the public view of the altar, you slink into the sequestered Confessions Room, the scent of old wood and whispered truths touching your senses.
travel_descriptions.south: Moving south from the altar, you approach the imposing door of the High Priest Chamber, a place steeped in deep religious significance and locked away mysteries.

Altar.name: Altar
Altar.description: The ornately decorated centerpiece of the church.
Altar.examine_text: The Altar is made of rich, dark wood and covered with a deep red silk cloth embroidered with gold. A hefty, ornate cross, studded with precious jewels glimmers atop the table, reflecting colored light across the room.

Jeweled Cross.name: Jeweled Cross
Jeweled Cross.description: A cross decorated with diamonds, sapphires, and rubies.
Jeweled Cross.examine_text: The cross is exceptionally large and ornate, almost glowing with reflected light from the carefully placed gems. It is a truly unique treasure.

Stained-Glass Window.name: Stained-Glass Window
Stained-Glass Window.description: A large, decorative window overlooking the altar.
Stained-Glass Window.examine_text: The window is made of multicolored glass, arranged in a brilliantly detailed depiction of a biblical scene. Sunlight streams through it, casting a beautiful display of colored light across the room.

Father Bartholomew.name: Father Bartholomew
Father Bartholomew.description: An old man with a kind face and soft eyes hidden behind round glasses. His hair is thinning and stark white. He is dressed in his usual black cassock and white collar.
Father Bartholomew.persona: I am Father Bartholomew, a humble servant of God who tends the spiritual needs of this parish. I devote my time to prayer, worship and guiding those who enter our holy sanctuary.
Father Bartholomew.goal: I am dedicated to serving the spiritual needs of my parish and providing counsel to the troubled.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A gentle, humble rosary, used by Father Bartholomew for devotions.
Rosary.examine_text: A simple string of dark wooden beads, with an old, worn cross at the end. Each bead is worn smooth from years of devout prayer.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: Father Bartholomew's personal prayer book, well-thumbed and marked with his own handwritten notations.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The book is aged and worn, but clearly treasured. It is filled with prayers and liturgies, as well as Father Bartholomew's own thoughts and reflections. The edges of the pages are worn thin and soft from constant use.

Flask of Holy Water.name: Flask of Holy Water
Flask of Holy Water.description: A small flask filled with cleansed, blessed water. A vital tool for exorcism and protection.
Flask of Holy Water.examine_text: The flask is unadorned, made of clear glass so the pure water inside is visible. A simple wooden stopper seals it tightly. The water itself seems to shimmer faintly, imbued with an essence of the divine.

Sister Agnes.name: Sister Agnes
Sister Agnes.description: She is a tall, thin woman, visibly aged but vigorous. Clad in the traditional habits of her order, her face emits serenity and peace.
Sister Agnes.persona: I am Sister Agnes, a devout nun who takes care of the church and those who inhabit and visit it. I spend most of my time in prayer, cleaning and maintaining the church, and helping those in need.
Sister Agnes.goal: My goal is to serve the Lord Jesus Christ, keep His Church clean and in order, and help the needy.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A simple wooden broom with a long handle.
Broom.examine_text: The broom is made of sturdy wood, with stiff straw-like bristles tied together at the base. It has gentle signs of wear but is in good condition, indicating that it has been used often but taken good care of.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A worn but well-maintained holy book.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible is bound in faded black leather, the edges of the pages tinged with gold leaf. The pages are filled with scripture and prayers, and despite some signs of aging, it has been kept in good condition. A ribbon bookmark is placed in the middle, marking a frequently-read passage.

Cleaning Cloth.name: Cleaning Cloth
Cleaning Cloth.description: A piece of white cloth used for cleaning.
Cleaning Cloth.examine_text: This is a simple piece of cloth, yet valuable for maintaining the church's cleanliness. It's slightly rough to the touch, perfect for scrubbing surfaces clean, although it carries a faint scent of an old wooden pew. Its edges are frayed from use.

John the Parishioner.name: John the Parishioner
John the Parishioner.description: John is in his mid-thirties, with a round and cheerful face topped with a mop of unruly brown hair. He usually sports casual attire, usually with some sort of church-related insignia.
John the Parishioner.persona: Hello! I'm John, just a regular parishioner here but active in church events. I attend mass regularly and sometimes help out during events.
John the Parishioner.goal: I want to be a good Christian and spread love and positivity.

Book of Hymns.name: Book of Hymns
Book of Hymns.description: A well-worn leather bound book filled with church hymns.
Book of Hymns.examine_text: John's thumb traces the embossed, gold lettering of the 'Book of Hymns'. The leather is worn soft from years of use. Inside, the pages are filled with church hymns, lyrics accompanied by sheet music. In the margins, you can see faint pencil marks, small annotations for the corresponding hymn.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A string of prayer beads often used in worship.
Rosary.examine_text: The rosary is a string of beautifully polished wooden beads, interspersed with small, ornate crosses. The centerpiece is a medallion featuring a depiction of the Virgin Mary. It's a symbol often used in worship and for personal prayers.

Donation Box.name: Donation Box
Donation Box.description: A secure box for charitable contributions.
Donation Box.examine_text: John spots the donation box nestled discreetly near the altar. The sturdy wooden box, secured by a heavy lock, is clearly used to collect offerings from the congregation. A small opening in the top allows for unseen donations to be made.

locations.name: Inside The Fairies Church
locations.description: No one has actually seen it, but a fairy interpreter asked a fairy and they described it as just a cloud of smoke and once in a while you trip over something in the floor.  The fairies purposely leave their trash in the floor because they think it is funny when people trip over them.
locations.background: The fairy church isn't really a church like we think.  Its more of a place for fairies to play tricks on other fairies.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the ethereal realm of the Fairy Church, you enter the attic. The journey is steep and a little dusty, the light fading with each step you take.
travel_descriptions.inside: Going deeper inside the Fairy Church, you are drawn into the study room. The air grows heavier with knowledge and the scent of ancient texts fills your nose.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending further within the church, you approach the grand Chamber Entrance. The air seems to buzz with spiritual energy and the rich scent of burning candles is more potent here.

Cloud of Smoke.name: Cloud of Smoke
Cloud of Smoke.description: A swirling mass of colors residing in the church
Cloud of Smoke.examine_text: As you approach, the cloud glows and pulses with an almost lifelike quality. It's strange and magical, yet also a bit disconcerting.

Discarded Fairy Trinkets.name: Discarded Fairy Trinkets
Discarded Fairy Trinkets.description: Small items and oddities dropped by the fairies
Discarded Fairy Trinkets.examine_text: They appear shiny and delicate, ranging from tiny bejeweled boxes to miniature golden goblets. They look precious, but picking them up might be a part of the fairies' trick.

Floor.name: Floor
Floor.examine_text: The floor is a strange, shifting surface, sometimes solid, sometimes soft like moss. You suspect the fairies may manipulate it as part of their tricks.

Fairy dust.name: Fairy dust
Fairy dust.description: A sparkling dust lingering in the air
Fairy dust.examine_text: Microscopic and lighter than air, yet glittering in a spectrum of colors. It feels magical, but you wonder if it's part of the fairies' pranks too.

Pixie.name: Pixie
Pixie.description: A miniature fairy with iridescent wings and a mischievous smile.
Pixie.persona: I'm Pixie, the trickster of the fairy world. My favorite pastime is watching someone trip over the invisible obstacles.
Pixie.goal: My goal is to create the most inventive invisible obstacle that causes the most hilarious fairy falls.

fairy_dust.name: Fairy Dust
fairy_dust.description: A glittering cloud of magical powder.
fairy_dust.examine_text: Upon close inspection, the fairy dust sparkles with a depth and variety of colors that seem impossible. There's a faint aromatic scent emitting off of it that fills your nostrils with a strange sensation of joy and mischief.

bluebell_flower.name: Bluebell Flower
bluebell_flower.description: A delicate blue flower, typically found in fairy domains.
bluebell_flower.examine_text: The bluebell flower's petals are a delicate, shimmering blue that seem to glow with an otherworldly light. Each bloom is shaped like a miniature bell, ringing lightly when the breeze touches it.

tiny_bells.name: Tiny Bell
tiny_bells.description: A minuscule silvered bell, known to be used by fairies for pranks.
tiny_bells.examine_text: The tiny bell, despite its size, emit a clear and distinct ring when moved. The surface of the bell is finely etched with intricate designs that seem to interweave and interact as you rotate it in the light.

Blossom.name: Blossom
Blossom.description: A delicate, sparkling fairy with glowing hair and luminescent wings.
Blossom.persona: I'm Blossom, the peacekeeper among the fairies. I secretly try to clean up the obstacles, maintaining a balance of fun and safety.
Blossom.goal: My goal is to keep the Fairy Church a place of fun without anyone getting seriously hurt.

moonbeam_brush.name: Moonbeam Brush
moonbeam_brush.description: A shimmering brush made from moonbeams
moonbeam_brush.examine_text: The brush flickers with a soothing light, its bristles seem ethereal yet solid. It exudes a calming aura, perfect for a peacekeeper like Blossom.

dewdrops.name: Dewdrops
dewdrops.description: Tiny droplets that sparkle in the fairy light
dewdrops.examine_text: These dewdrops shimmer with an otherworldly glow, reflecting the colourful lights of the fairy church. Despite their small size, they hold much potential.

bag_of_fairy_dust.name: Bag of Fairy Dust
bag_of_fairy_dust.description: A small bag filled with sparkling fairy dust
bag_of_fairy_dust.examine_text: The bag is weightless and almost transparent. Inside, the fairy dust sparkles with all the colours of the rainbow. It's said to possess the ability to clean up the fairy mess.

Flicker.name: Flicker
Flicker.description: A quick and lively fairy that sparkles with an array of colors as he moves.
Flicker.persona: I'm Flicker, the forgetful fairy also known to trip over invisible obstacles. But it's all in good fun!
Flicker.goal: My goal is to enjoy and partake in all the pranks, even if I'm often the victim!

glowing_acorn.name: Glowing Acorn
glowing_acorn.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see a tiny, sparkling, silver acorn. It emits a soft, eerie glow. It's small and light, perfect for a forgetful/faerie to carry.

spider_silk.name: Spider Silk
spider_silk.description: A fine, glimmery strand of spider silk. Looks sturdy.
spider_silk.examine_text: It's a long, glittering strand of spider silk. It's tougher than it looks, and it shimmers when light falls on it.

sheaf_of_miniature_jokes.name: Sheaf of Miniature Jokes
sheaf_of_miniature_jokes.description: A small sheaf of paper that has a number of fairy jokes on it.
sheaf_of_miniature_jokes.examine_text: The jokes are written in a tiny, flowing script, probably by fairies. Some of them are really silly, or maybe it's fairy humor that you just don't get.

locations.name: Church Coat Room
locations.description: The church coat room is dark and smelly, holding all the coats and boots of the congregation who happen to be in the church at the time. There is a candle sconce high on the wall near the entrance, benches along the back of the room and huge baskets along opposite walls: one for coats and the other for footwear.
locations.background: This room used to be a primitive bathroom ten years ago, but became too smelly and difficult to clean. People complained, and it was re-purposed as a coat room. It is vented at the top for when they used to burn excrement.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: An old, worn-out wooden bench used by people to sit and put on their footwear.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench has faded in color due to years of exposure to moisture and is slightly shaky due to people constantly sitting on it and changing their shoes. It has an aroma of mixed scents from the various leather and fabric shoes that have been placed on it over the years.

Wicker Baskets.name: Wicker Baskets
Wicker Baskets.description: Large wicker baskets used for holding coats and shoes.
Wicker Baskets.examine_text: The baskets are made of sturdy plaited wicker with a deep, wide opening for coats and shoes. They have been reinforced on the bottom to handle the weight of the items being placed on them.

Candle Sconce.name: Candle Sconce
Candle Sconce.description: An ornate wall-mounted candle sconce providing a gentle, flickering light.
Candle Sconce.examine_text: The sconce is a little high up, but you can see that it's made of iron, rusted slightly from age, holding a single thick wax candle that's been burned down a little. It provides just enough light to cast eerie shadows on the coats in the basket.

Doris.name: Doris
Doris.description: A kind, elderly woman, with glasses perched on her wrinkled face and donning a friendly smile. She's dressed in Sunday's best and has a slight stoop, which signifies her years.
Doris.persona: I'm Doris. I have been coming to this church every Sunday for as long as I can remember. I help out managing the coat room.
Doris.goal: To serve my community by managing the coat room of the church.

Sunday Bible.name: Sunday Bible
Sunday Bible.examine_text: The bible appears to be leather-bound with gilt pages. The words 'Holy Bible' are embossed in gold on the front. There are notes and annotations in the margins, presumably written by Doris.

Old Leather Wallet.name: Old Leather Wallet
Old Leather Wallet.description: A battered brown leather wallet that has seen better days.
Old Leather Wallet.examine_text: This worn-out wallet is made from brown leather which is scratched and faded. The inside reveals multiple card slots piled high with different cards, mostly church related. A small, old driver's license photo of Doris is tucked in the corner.

Keys to the Church.name: Keys to the Church
Keys to the Church.description: A large, heavy, and ornate key ring holding multiple keys.
Keys to the Church.examine_text: The key ring is a thick, tarnished silver loop holding a variety of keys of different shapes and sizes. Each one is labeled with what seems to be a cryptic code. The heaviest key, presumably the one for the main entrance, has a cross fashioned into its handle.

Father Martin.name: Father Martin
Father Martin.description: Middle-aged and slightly portly, Father Martin's cheerful face is often seen under his signature brown brimmed hat. Always clad in black with a white collar, he carries an unmistakable air of kindness.
Father Martin.persona: I am Father Martin, I look after the needs of my congregation and ensure the functions of this church run smoothly.
Father Martin.goal: To ensure all those in need find solace at our church.

Religious texts.name: Religious texts
Religious texts.description: Carefully aged religious texts composed of different scriptures.
Religious texts.examine_text: The texts are neatly transcribed on brightly colored pages, encased in a worn leather book. The pages are filled with various teachings and philosophies, each a treasure trove of wisdom that aids Father Martin in his sermons.

Clerical collar.name: Clerical collar
Clerical collar.description: A stiff, white collar that signifies Father Martin's religious status.
Clerical collar.examine_text: The collar is crisp to the touch. Made from starched linen, it is a symbol of the duty Father Martin has to his congregation. The simplicity of the design represents his vow of poverty, chastity, and obedience.

Brass cross.name: Brass cross
Brass cross.description: A small, golden cross that Father Martin often carries.
Brass cross.examine_text: The brass cross is simple yet elegant. The quality of the metal has suffered with time but it still maintains a certain shine. The arms of the cross are embossed with tiny, intricate symbols, showcasing the craftsmanship that went into its creation.

Petey.name: Petey
Petey.description: Petey's just a young boy, with innocent eyes full of curiosity. He's often seen in his scruffy clothes and holding onto an old action figure.
Petey.persona: I'm Petey. I'm here with my family. But I found this neat little room where I can play with my action figures.
Petey.goal: To explore every nook and cranny of the church.

Blue action figure.name: Blue action figure
Blue action figure.description: An old and fall Classic Collector's Special Super Hero action figure with blue armor.
Blue action figure.examine_text: The action figure stands as tall as a bottle-top. Its blue paint is slightly scratched from the years of play, yet its make is unmistakable. It is a Classic Collector's Special Super Hero, a real gem among action figures. It's very durable and can be used in many imaginative ways.

Ham sandwich.name: Ham sandwich
Ham sandwich.description: A half-eaten sandwich with ham and cheese.
Ham sandwich.examine_text: Examining the sandwich, you can see the thick slices of ham peeking from between two pieces of fresh white bread. There are chunks of cheese and smears of mayo completing this delicious-looking snack. It's only half-eaten, so there's still plenty to keep you filled.

locations.name: Church Foyer
locations.description: This musty room is fairly plain and drab and is surrounded by stone walls.  There's religious tapestries adorning these walls along with some chairs for people to wait before the actual church is opening up to them.
locations.background: Worshippers comes to the foyer to wait to be let into the main church for daily service.  This is also the place where rumors fly about as worshippers talk among each other.

travel_descriptions.north: Ascending the stone steps to the north, you can feel the cold seeping through the soles of your feet. As you reach the top, the grandeur of The Main Chapel unfurls before you.
travel_descriptions.west: A creaky path to the west leads to an old wooden Pew. The journey is filled with an eerie quiet that only amplifies the whispers of the past.
travel_descriptions.beside: Venturing beside the Church, you pass through rows upon rows of Church Pews. The journey is both daunting and awe-inspiring, with the shadowy hush a stark contrast to the outside world.

Wooden Chair.name: Wooden Chair
Wooden Chair.description: A simple durable wooden chair with an ornately carved back.
Wooden Chair.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the chair's carving depicted a serene scenario.  The hardwood has been polished to a shine and comes with a velvet cushion for the sitter to avoid discomfort.

Religious Tapestry.name: Religious Tapestry
Religious Tapestry.description: A large colorful tapestry depicting a religious story.
Religious Tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry grapples the attention with intricate detailing and vibrant colors. Various shapes, figures and symbols used to display biblical stories are woven onto it with a mastery that speak the hands of a skilled artisan.

Stone Lighting Wall sconce.name: Stone Lighting Wall sconce
Stone Lighting Wall sconce.description: A stone holder for candles that's attached to the wall.
Stone Lighting Wall sconce.examine_text: The stone has been carved and hewn into an intricate holder for two or three candles. Flint and iron is kept by this setting for times when the wax sticks have to be replaced for a new lighting.

Elderly Martha.name: Elderly Martha
Elderly Martha.description: A frail, old lady with silver hair neatly tied in a bun, her old age lines visible on her face. She carries a cane by her side and usually found in a deep green velvet dress.
Elderly Martha.persona: I spend most of my time praying and finding solace in God's words. Sharing stories of my past with others is something I enjoy.
Elderly Martha.goal: To find peace through prayer and enlighten others with faith.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of beads used for praying.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The beads are well worn, and a simple cross hangs from the end of the string. Each bead represents a different prayer, and by counting them, one can keep track of their prayers.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A worn-out bible, pages yellowed with age.
Bible.examine_text: The pages are filled with archaic text, underlined passages and handwritten notes on the margins. The cover is wrinkled and worn from repeated use, and the bindings are frail and fragile.

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: A wooden cane used for support when walking.
Cane.examine_text: The cane has a curved handle that fits comfortably in the hand. It is a beautiful walnut color, polished and decorated with small symbols of faith at the top. The bottom is capped with a piece of rubber to prevent slipping.

Young Timothy.name: Young Timothy
Young Timothy.description: A young boy in his early teens, with freckles on his face and a head full of chestnut colored hair. He is often found wearing a neat choir robe.
Young Timothy.persona: I love singing hymns and the silence of the church makes me feel calm. I'm an aspiring artist and like sketching the church scenes in my notebook.
Young Timothy.goal: To fully excel in his choir performance and sketch a perfect portrait of the church.

Father Douglas.name: Father Douglas
Father Douglas.description: A stout man in his late forties, with sparkling eyes hiding behind half-rimmed specs. He is often robed in a black cassock with a wide, warm smile greeting the worshipers.
Father Douglas.persona: I find joy in connecting with the people and serving the church. Most often, you would find me engrossed in scriptures or helping out others.
Father Douglas.goal: To bring the community closer through faith and compassion.

Church Key.name: Church Key
Church Key.description: A large, worn, and ancient key made of solid iron
Church Key.examine_text: The key is hefty, implying that it's made to open a heavy door. You notice a religious insignia on the key, which could mean this key opens a significant part of the church.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick and well-thumbed book, holy scriptures inscribed within.
Bible.examine_text: The bible is worn from many years of use. Its pages are thin and brittle with age, and Father Douglas's notes are scattered throughout the margins.

locations.name: Inside Church Back Row
locations.description: Inside the Church is the Back Row seat.  It is reserved for all who wish to mingle and have the status of the rest of the congregation but they do not.  They are not quite outcast, but they must wait for the proper respect of the rest.  In front of the painted black row seats are the rich mahogany sets.
locations.background: The back row seats were designed in the village church to show there is something lacking in its occupants.  Those sitting there knew they had to wait for acceptance to reach the mahogany seats.  They weren't bad, they were just unknown or considered mysterious people.

travel_descriptions.east: A short walk from back row towards the front leads you through the long, wooden pews, capturing an environment imbued with reverence and faith.
travel_descriptions.outside: Stepping outside, the celestial light filtrating through the multihued stained glass paints a vivid tableau on the age-old pews, reflecting the church's spiritual and historical significance, making the travel almost ethereal.
travel_descriptions.inside: Moving towards the interior of the location, you'd find yourself amidst the dogs' domain, which is somewhat chaotic, giving insights into a quirky, informal animal society.

Wooden Pew.name: Wooden Pew
Wooden Pew.description: A lone wooden row seat at the back of the church.
Wooden Pew.examine_text: It's a sturdy, somewhat aged wooden pew. The wood is a bit scuffed from years of use and the finish is dull. Past generations must have sat here.

Hymn Book.name: Hymn Book
Hymn Book.description: A thick hymn book, filled with church songs and prayers.
Hymn Book.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the hymn book reveals worn edges and soft, well-thumbed pages. Annotations are made in neat handwriting in the margins of some songs.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.description: A slender brass candlestick holding a tapered candle.
Candlestick.examine_text: The surface of the candlestick seems to hold years of polish and care. The wax candle is barely used, with a small wick sticking out at the top.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A small set of prayer beads made from wood.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: These beads are worn smooth from repeated use, strung together on a thin, sturdy string. Each bead seems to hold a history of prayers spoken silently or whispered to the air.

Old Widow Martha.name: Old Widow Martha
Old Widow Martha.description: Martha is a thin, elderly lady with a frail look. She always wears her black clothing and carries a weathered old Bible.
Old Widow Martha.persona: I've seen better days. I used to be a prominent figure in the society, but now people hardly know me. I guess time has left me behind.
Old Widow Martha.goal: To maintain her faith by never missing a service and hoping for acceptance from the rest of the mix.

Old black Bible.name: Old black Bible
Old black Bible.description: Old Widow Martha's trusted black Bible, looking worn out from years of use.
Old black Bible.examine_text: This black Bible appears worn from many years of use. The pages are thin and translucent, and there are handwritten notes in the margins, indicating deep engagement with the scripture. It looks like it might fall apart at any time.

Tin filled with peppermints.name: Tin filled with peppermints
Tin filled with peppermints.description: A tin containing peppermints, a common sweet treat for Old Widow Martha.
Tin filled with peppermints.examine_text: The tin, showing signs of wear and tear, is filled to the brim with white, round peppermints. Each mint is individually wrapped in clear cellophane, and they have a potent, refreshing smell that immediately fills your nostrils as you open the tin.

Handkerchief.name: Handkerchief
Handkerchief.description: Old Widow Martha's personal handkerchief. It looks like it has dried many tears.
Handkerchief.examine_text: This handkerchief is faded and slightly stained, suggesting frequent use over the years. It's made of fine fabric but bears the mark of many weary days of usage. Its patterns are faded and bear the signs of frequent washing.

Stranger John.name: Stranger John
Stranger John.description: John is a tall, broad-shouldered man with dense stubble and piercing eyes, always seen in a dark trench coat and a hat hiding most of his face.
Stranger John.persona: I don't talk much. This place... it's peaceful. Helps me clear my mind. But people here, they fear what they don't understand. And they don't understand me.
Stranger John.goal: To blend in and find peace, while hoping to gradually earn the trust and acceptance of the inhabitants.

Trench Coat.name: Trench Coat
Trench Coat.description: A worn-out beige trench coat sitting on the back row.
Trench Coat.examine_text: This trench coat seems to have done its rounds. The seams at the elbows look frayed, and there are patches where the original color has faded to an almost muddied brown. Inside the deep pockets, you find some crumpled pieces of paper and a strange coin.

Brass Lighter.name: Brass Lighter
Brass Lighter.description: A shiny brass lighter placed on the seat next to the trench coat.
Brass Lighter.examine_text: This brass lighter is heavily weathered. There are tiny engravings of crosses which are slowly fading. The lighter seems pretty old but still works just fine. On the bottom, you can see initials "S.J." engraved.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A rosary with black beads loosely held in the trench coat's pocket.
Rosary.examine_text: The rosary has black beads and a wooden cross hanging from it. It looks old and worn out, as though it has been used regularly for a long time. There is a name 'John' scrached on the back of the cross.

Young Mary.name: Young Mary
Young Mary.description: Mary, a young, shy girl with a pure heart, wears simple clothes and carries her notebook to draw the beautiful stained glass windows.
Young Mary.persona: I'm really shy and keep to myself. I come here because I love the silence and the beauty of this place. It's my world where I can be who I wanna be.
Young Mary.goal: To peacefully observe and draw the world around her, while seeking eventual recognition of her talent.

Sketchbook.name: Sketchbook
Sketchbook.description: A well-used sketchbook with a leather cover.
Sketchbook.examine_text: Everything in life is reduced to its core elements in this book. Your admiration for this place and everything you see can be catalogued here, framed in a style only you can bring -- the beautiful stained glass, the intricate woodwork, even the soulfully silent back row. It's a world onto itself, and you belong in this world.

Pack of colored pencils.name: Pack of colored pencils
Pack of colored pencils.description: A small pack of vibrant colored pencils.
Pack of colored pencils.examine_text: A pack of colored pencils with varying shades of every color. They are well sharpened and ready to use. With these, you can capture the magnificence of this place and the quiet serenity it brings to your soul.

Small bag with sandwiches.name: Small bag with sandwiches
Small bag with sandwiches.description: A small paper bag filled with hand-made sandwiches.
Small bag with sandwiches.examine_text: Inside the bag, there are some sandwiches carefully wrapped in aluminum foil. Your mother made them for you, spreading love between two slices of bread. It's a small piece of homemade comfort in this vast sanctuary, which makes this place feel even more like home.

locations.name: Popes Dormitory
locations.description: This is the quarters where the pope of the church lives. It is a loft with a bedroom, and makeshift kitchen and a sitting area. It has a wall full of gospel books and materials and the linens are all silk.
locations.background: This is where the pope of the church stays during his religious times of the year where he is to be present in the church at all times. This would usually fall around holidays, and there is only enough room in the dormitory for the pope himself.

travel_descriptions.up: A twisting wooden staircase leads upwards to the Bell Tower, the air growing colder as you ascend.
travel_descriptions.front: Moving towards the Front Row, you pass through the sacred space of the church, the scent of incense filling your nostrils.
travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping into the Confessional Room means letting go of the noise of the outer world, embracing the quiet and soulful solitude within.

Gospel Books.name: Gospel Books
Gospel Books.description: A collection of gospel books and religious materials.
Gospel Books.examine_text: The volumes contain various gospel texts, prayers, and teachings. Each book is worn with use, its bindings creased and pages yellowed from many years of devoted study.

Silk Linens.name: Silk Linens
Silk Linens.description: Expensive, opulent silk linens, set aside for the pope's use.
Silk Linens.examine_text: The silk linens are luxurious, their rich texture is cool and tantalizing to the touch. The pope must have a comfortable sleep amidst his religious duties.

Makeshift Kitchen.name: Makeshift Kitchen
Makeshift Kitchen.description: A small, functional kitchen area, just enough for one person's needs.
Makeshift Kitchen.examine_text: The kitchen is small but well-kept, with a stove, pot, and some basic utensils. There's a smell of fresh bread and soup from the last use.

Pope Benedict XVI.name: Pope Benedict XVI
Pope Benedict XVI.description: A wise, elderly man in white papal vestments with a tall, pointed mitre. His glasses sit perched on the edge of his nose as he reads from a gospel.
Pope Benedict XVI.persona: I dedicate my life to the service of God and the Church. It's my duty to lead His people to salvation.
Pope Benedict XVI.goal: Guide the faithful to salvation and uphold the doctrines of the Church

Silver Cross.name: Silver Cross
Silver Cross.description: A simple yet elegant silver cross hangs around Pope Benedict's neck.
Silver Cross.examine_text: Upon close inspection, the silver cross bears intricate engravings, an insignia possibly signifying the pope's devotion to his faith. Despite its simplicity, the cross emanates an aura of divine authority and unconditional love.

Gospel Book.name: Gospel Book
Gospel Book.description: A well-worn book filled with the Word of God lays on the table.
Gospel Book.examine_text: Every page of the gospel book is laden with wisdom and teachings. Used regularly in liturgical settings, the text holds great significance, and it bears marks of constant usage: dog-eared pages, highlighted verses, and notes written in the margins.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A rosary with beads made from olive wood lies next to the gospel book.
Rosary.examine_text: You perceive a sense of profound peace when you scrutinize the rosary. Each bead is expertly made, reflecting years of skilled craftsmanship. It is clear that this rosary is not simply an accessory, but a tool of faith, used for prayer and meditation.

Father Cummings.name: Father Cummings
Father Cummings.description: A middle-aged priest, with glasses and a soft smile. He wears a traditional black cassock and carries a worn bible.
Father Cummings.persona: As the Pope's personal aide, I take care of his needs and ensure he is ready for any event. I'm always by his side.
Father Cummings.goal: Help the Pope and ensure his time in the dormitory is comfortable and peaceful

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick, heavily annotated edition of the Holy Bible.
Bible.examine_text: This tattered book filled with thin pages features scribblings and notes within its margins. The corners are worn from countless page flips, and you can feel the dedication and love poured into these scriptures.

Clerical collar.name: Clerical collar
Clerical collar.description: A white, stiff collar signaling the wearer's religious status.
Clerical collar.examine_text: The collar carries an aura of solemnity and spirituality. Made of sturdy, white material, it's very clean, almost gleaming. Only a thin black line runs through the center, a universal symbol of the clergy.

Clergy pectoral cross.name: Clergy pectoral cross
Clergy pectoral cross.description: A gold cross adorned with precious stones, hanging on a long chain.
Clergy pectoral cross.examine_text: The cross glitters under the light, each gemstone inset into the gold reflecting the light beautifully. It's not just a sign of faith, but also a work of art.

Sister Mary.name: Sister Mary
Sister Mary.description: She is a kind, elderly woman wearing a traditional nun's habit. Her face radiates peace and love, and in her hands, she holds a rosary.
Sister Mary.persona: Discipleship is my mission in life. I try my best to make people feel welcome and loved in the Church as Pope's assistant.
Sister Mary.goal: To assist in the Pope's daily prayers and serve the Church

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: An elegant holy rosary made of smooth, small round beads
Rosary.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice it's a strand of 59 beads with a crucifix at the end. This is no ordinary rosary, it's made up of rose petals. It's Sister Mary's way of reminding people that the Church is filled with love and warmth.

Religious Pamphlet.name: Religious Pamphlet
Religious Pamphlet.description: A small booklet that contains information about the gospel
Religious Pamphlet.examine_text: It's a neatly folded piece of parchment, bound together with a ribbon. The cover has beautiful calligraphy, writing 'Love Thy Neighbour'. Sister Mary hands these out to visitors in the hopes they might find comfort in them.

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: A small vial filled with water, blessed by the Pope
Holy Water.examine_text: The vial is made of clear glass and filled with water that sparkles a little in the light. The water has been blessed by the Pope. It's commonly used by Sister Mary for various blessings and rituals.

locations.name: The Rectory
locations.description: This room is quite small and cramped. It's about the size of maybe three wooden carts, which is to say, it's very small. There are boxes all over the place and many candles and other church accessories. There are several big robes hanging next to what looks like a very small closet. Some candles shed an eerie light on the room, flickering softly. There is a small cabinet with several religious tapes and records and a few books. A book case is near and contains many common religious texts.
locations.background: The rectory is one of the most important rooms in the church, as it is where the priest and others get ready before they start church, where the put on robes and cassocks and the like. It is vital to the church as a matter of fact. Visibility to the room is blocked off by the altar in front of it, so church goers cannot see it unless they walk behind the altar. It seems to be used as a bit of a storage area for religious artifacts.

travel_descriptions.south: Walking south to the Confessional, you creep through corridors imbued with a heavy air of sanctity. The faint scent of incense begins to permeate the air as you approach.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west towards The Sacred Temple, you traverse the austere garden of the Rectory, its peaceful ambiance a stark contrast to the enormity of the temple’s splendor that looms ahead.
travel_descriptions.inside: Stepping inside The Confession Box is a quasi-spiritual experience, with the claustrophobic space and solemn atmosphere making your heart pound in your chest.

Cabinet.name: Cabinet
Cabinet.description: A small wooden cabinet filled with religious tapes and records.
Cabinet.examine_text: The cabinet looks old and worn out. It's filled with various religious tapes and records.

Robes.name: Robes
Robes.description: Several big robes are hanging neatly on hooks.
Robes.examine_text: The robes are thick and heavy, perfect for the chilly interior of the church. They are embroidered with intricate designs of crosses and saints.

Candles.name: Candles
Candles.description: A set of candles gently illuminating the room.
Candles.examine_text: The flickering light from the candles creates shadows that dance across the room. They have a soft, slightly smoky scent.

Bookcase.name: Bookcase
Bookcase.description: A bookcase filled with religious texts.
Bookcase.examine_text: The bookcase is full to the brim with different religious texts. Some books are thumbed through often, while others are covered in a layer of dust.

Father Matthew.name: Father Matthew
Father Matthew.description: A tall, thin man with a calm and composed demeanor. He has soft grey eyes, a kind smile, and a slightly receding hairline.
Father Matthew.persona: I always try my best to guide my flock towards the path of righteousness. Prayer and faith are my mainstay, and I take joy in interpreting the scriptures for my congregation.
Father Matthew.goal: Preparing his sermon for the next mass and wants to make it enlightening for his congregation.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A simple, yet beautiful strand of beads, often used in prayer.
Rosary.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the Rosary is decorated with small rose-shaped carvings on each bead, and a small silver cross hangs at the end. The detail is intricate, and it's clear that whoever crafted this Rosary put a lot of love into it.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A well-worn book containing the scriptures and teachings of the church, filled with wisdom and guidance.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible is rather worn, showing it's been read and referenced countless times. The pages are thin and fragile, filled with beautiful calligraphy and highlighted passages. A bookmark peeks from within, marking a particularly well-loved verse.

Robe.name: Robe
Robe.description: A long, flowing robe worn by Father Matthew during church services.
Robe.examine_text: The robe is long and dignified, made of a soft, yet sturdy fabric. Its deep purple hue is rich and calming, and a gold cross is sewn on the upper left chest. When worn, it should reach close to the ground, giving a feeling of gravitas and authority.

Sister Abigail.name: Sister Abigail
Sister Abigail.description: A petite, aged woman full of life and love, she is seen with a pure white habit on her head and a warm smile on her face.
Sister Abigail.persona: I'm devoted to a simple and humble life of prayer. I help in the community wherever I can, all while praying to God for his divine blessings.
Sister Abigail.goal: Trying to find a lost sacred relic which has been misplaced in the rectory.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A string of beads used in prayer.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: Looks like a simple set of prayer beads. Each one has been carved from wood and threaded onto a piece of string. It's well used, suggesting it's a regular part of Sister Abigail's prayer routine.

Small Crucifix.name: Small Crucifix
Small Crucifix.description: A small wooden crucifix, often used in prayer or as a reminder of faith.
Small Crucifix.examine_text: The crucifix is small, light, and made of wood. It shows signs of wear, suggesting it's withstood years of use. The figure of Christ is finely detailed and Holy symbol is clearly visible.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: The holy book of Christianity, containing the teachings of Jesus Christ.
Bible.examine_text: This Bible appears well-loved, with worn corners and creased pages. Handwritten notes in the margins and highlighted passages reveal frequent study. It holds the sacred text that guides Sister Abigail's life and faith.

Brother Thomas.name: Brother Thomas
Brother Thomas.description: Young and eager, Thomas is often seen bustling around with a stack of hymn books or cleaning vestments.
Brother Thomas.persona: I assist Father Mathew in his daily tasks and help keep the rectory clean and organized. I'm still learning and often make mistakes, but I'm constantly striving for improvement.
Brother Thomas.goal: To organize the mess in the rectory before the next mass.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A worn out broom with coarse bristles. Its handle is a bit wobbly.
Broom.examine_text: The broom is worn through use with strands of straws sticking out awkwardly from all sides. There are remnants of dust and grit stuck in between the thick bristles. The wooden handle is long, worn smooth by the sweat and pressure of many gripping hands.

Duster.name: Duster
Duster.description: A thick feather duster. Covered in dust and cobwebs.
Duster.examine_text: The feather duster has long feathers of different colors. The tip is filled with dust, perhaps from lack of use. The handle is wooden and bears few splinters.

Sacramental wine.name: Sacramental wine
Sacramental wine.description: A bottle of Sacramental wine. It's used during mass.
Sacramental wine.examine_text: The bottle is made of glass with a silver foil wrapped around its neck, bearing an ornate cross symbol. The wine inside is a dark rich color. It also bears an aroma that is both sweet and bitter.

locations.name: Nave
locations.description: Long, wooden pews are positioned one in front of the other from the front of the room to the back. There are ornate stained glass windows on each side depicting the steps in the Crucifixion story. A long, red runner goes up the middle of the room to the altar.
locations.background: The nave was beautifully decorated and was a wonderful place to worship. The priests would go up and down the aisle to collect the tithings from the congregation every Sunday. The room was almost like an echo chamber in that when the congregation would sing it would sound like there were ten times more people than there actually were.

Wooden Pew.name: Wooden Pew
Wooden Pew.description: Long, polished wooden pew perfect for sitting during sermons
Wooden Pew.examine_text: The pew appears old and hallowed, still glistening from the polish. There's a hint of an antique smell and an comforting ambience.

Stained Glass Windows.name: Stained Glass Windows
Stained Glass Windows.description: Ornate windows depicting biblical scenes in vivid colors
Stained Glass Windows.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the artwork on the windows is indeed impressive. Each scene is meticulously crafted, reflecting light in a way that breathes life into the depictions.

Red Runner Rug.name: Red Runner Rug
Red Runner Rug.description: Long, red runner rug that lines the path to the altar
Red Runner Rug.examine_text: This thick rug bears the faded traces of hundreds of years of pious footsteps. One can almost feel the fervent prayers of those souls who paced this path.

Father John.name: Father John
Father John.description: A middle-aged man dressed in elegant white and gold priestly robes, with attentive and calm blue eyes and a kind smile.
Father John.persona: I'm Father John, the parish priest. I've dedicated my life to the service of my flock and the church.
Father John.goal: My goal is to guide the congregation and provide spiritual comfort and advice.

cross_necklace.name: Cross Necklace
cross_necklace.description: A simple, silver cross necklace belonging to Father John.
cross_necklace.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you see it is a finely crafted cross with a small inscription on the back that reads 'In His Service'. It seems to have been worn for many years and is a symbol of Father John's dedication to the church.

bible.name: Bible
bible.description: Father John's well-worn Bible, filled with highlighted passages and handwritten notes.
bible.examine_text: The Bible, when opened, shows signs of frequent use. Certain pages have been marked and passages highlighted, showing Father John's meticulous study and deep understanding of the holy scripture.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A set of rosary beads owned and regularly used by Father John.
rosary.examine_text: The rosary beads are humble and simple, composed of plain wooden beads and a small, silver cross. The beads are slightly worn indicating years of use.

Sister Agnes.name: Sister Agnes
Sister Agnes.description: An older woman with a calm demeanor and caring gaze; wearing traditional black-and-white nun's habit and emanates an aura of serenity.
Sister Agnes.persona: I am Sister Agnes, devoted to my faith and service. I find peace in aiding those in need and in steadfast prayer.
Sister Agnes.goal: My goal is to provide care, guidance, and spiritual support to our congregation.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A beautiful string of worn weathered beads, ending in a small cross.
rosary.examine_text: The rosary consists of a simple metal cross hanging from a string of beads. Each bead is equally worn, evidence that it has been used countless times in prayer. There is a sense of peaceful energy emanating from it, despite it being such a simple item.

prayer book.name: Prayer Book
prayer book.description: A well-thumbed book with a leather cover and thin, delicate pages.
prayer book.examine_text: Upon opening the book, you see pages filled with worn text and carefully marked sections. It has been used so often that it naturally falls open to a page with a particular prayer. It is clear that Sister Agnes values this book greatly, carrying with her the prayers of centuries.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A tall wax candle, marked with the a sign of the cross.
candle.examine_text: When lit, the flame of this candle flickers gently, casting a warm, peaceful light. It's not just a source of light, but a symbol of faith, kept lit throughout services or during personal prayer. It's evident that Sister Agnes uses it as a focus during her devotion.

Michael the Choir Lead.name: Michael the Choir Lead
Michael the Choir Lead.description: A young man with vivid green eyes and curly hair, wearing a maroon choir robe and holding a pitch pipe.
Michael the Choir Lead.persona: I'm Michael, the lead singer in our choir. I find nothing more fulfilling than praising God through song.
Michael the Choir Lead.goal: My goal is to lead the congregation in harmonious worship through music.

songbook.name: songbook
songbook.description: A thick, worn out book filled with hymns and praises.
songbook.examine_text: The hymnal is a simple hardcover with the church's emblem embossed on its front cover. Its once bright gold edges are now faded with continual use. Slight creases mark the spine as it opens to show pages filled with musical notes, lyrics, and penciled-in harmony lines. It carries a subtle fragrance of aged paper, hinting its age and reverence.

pitch pipe.name: pitch pipe
pitch pipe.description: A small, metallic, whistle-like device for establishing pitch.
pitch pipe.examine_text: The pitch pipe is silver, looking almost like a harmonica; it has a cool metallic feel on handling. It has several holes labeled with musical notes. When you blow into it, it produces a clear, resonant sound that guides the choir into perfect pitch synchrony.

locations.name: A Small Church
locations.description: It's a very humble abode - any smaller and you could mistake it for someone's home.  In the front room is a small altar for prayer and offerings.  The two rooms to the sides are places where the priest and a traveler can rest.
locations.background: There are many roadside churches in the land and this is but one of them.  Most travelers come here to rest on their way to the nearest town, still a day's travel away.

altar.name: altar
altar.description: A small wooden altar placed at the front of the church.
altar.examine_text: The altar is well-worn but well-kept, showing signs of regular use and care. The top of the altar is smooth, with a simple cloth draped over it. A couple of candles are placed at the sides, their wicks blackened from many prayers.

candle.name: candle
candle.description: A wax candle on the altar, it provides a soft glow to the room.
candle.examine_text: The candle is mostly melted down, showing its frequent use. The wax is creamy white, and the flame dances gently, casting a warm light around the altar.

traveler's cot.name: traveler's cot
traveler's cot.description: A simple cot, available to any weary traveler who needs it.
traveler's cot.examine_text: The cot is made of simple wood and a thin straw mattress. It doesn't look particularly comfortable, but it's certainly better than sleeping on the ground.

priest's robe.name: priest's robe
priest's robe.description: A simple robe belonging to the priest.
priest's robe.examine_text: Though simple, the robe has a quiet elegance to it. It's made of rough cloth in muted colors. Despite its simplicity, the robe carries an aura of significance.

Father Benjamin.name: Father Benjamin
Father Benjamin.description: He's a thin, older man with a kind smile, dressed in simple priest robes. His grey hair and thin glasses give him a scholarly appearance.
Father Benjamin.persona: I've dedicated my life to serving others, to guide and comfort those in need. My church may be small, but its doors are always open.
Father Benjamin.goal: My goal is to provide spiritual guidance and solace to anyone who seeks it.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: An old, well-used bible.
Bible.examine_text: The bible is bound in worn leather. Some pages are frayed, indicative of being flipped through many times. Handwritten notes and annotations are spread throughout the text.

Wooden Cross.name: Wooden Cross
Wooden Cross.description: A simple, wooden cross hanging on the wall.
Wooden Cross.examine_text: The cross is made from simple, unvarnished wood. Despite its simplicity, it evokes a sense of calm and reverence. It's slightly worn due to age but still very much intact.

Reading Glasses.name: Reading Glasses
Reading Glasses.examine_text: A pair of antiquated, round glasses with a thin golden rim. The lenses are slightly magnified to help Father Benjamin read his sermons and scriptures.

Hanna.name: Hanna
Hanna.description: A woman in her mid-thirties, dressed in worn, but serviceable traveling clothes. Her blonde hair is tied back and her blue eyes spark with determination.
Hanna.persona: I'm just passing through on my way to a new life.  Stopping at this church gives me time to gather my thoughts and my strength for the journey ahead.
Hanna.goal: I'm trying to reach the next town by tomorrow.

Travel Bag.name: Travel Bag
Travel Bag.description: A rugged brown bag, the kind that's been through a lot, just like its owner.
Travel Bag.examine_text: The bag is worn but sturdy. It seems to be filled with the necessities of a traveler; food, water, some money. You notice a small latched pocket which may contain something more personal.

Flask of Water.name: Flask of Water
Flask of Water.description: A flask filled with clear, refreshing water.
Flask of Water.examine_text: The flask is made of leather and cork. It is filled to the brim with water that looks fresh and cool to the touch. There's enough water here to sustain a person for about half a day's journey.

Half-Eaten Loaf of Bread.name: Half-Eaten Loaf of Bread
Half-Eaten Loaf of Bread.description: A loaf of bread, half-eaten but still quite fresh.
Half-Eaten Loaf of Bread.examine_text: This is a simple loaf of bread, half-eaten but still fresh. It's a plain bread, made out of whole grains. Whoever was eating this wasn't doing so out of luxury, but necessity.

Little Timmy.name: Little Timmy
Little Timmy.description: A small boy, around six years old, with scruffy hair and a smudged face. He's dressed in simple, worn clothing and seems to have a perpetually curious expression.
Little Timmy.persona: I'm always exploring and playing around! This small church is my favorite place 'cos Father Benjamin tells me stories.
Little Timmy.goal: I want to hear a new story from Father Benjamin today.

Small Wooden Toy.name: Small Wooden Toy
Small Wooden Toy.description: A carefully crafted small wooden toy
Small Wooden Toy.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see this is a rustic but well-made wooden horse. It is full of tiny carvings, which takes someone with real talent to make. Little Timmy must be really proud of it.

Slice of Apple Pie.name: Slice of Apple Pie
Slice of Apple Pie.description: A delicious, homemade slice of apple pie
Slice of Apple Pie.examine_text: The apple pie slice emanates a warm fragrance. It’s crust perfectly golden brown and flakey; the filling is just the right balance of sweetness and tartness with a hint of cinnamon. Its look suggests that it may just have been baked by Father Benjamin himself.

locations.name: Inside Church
locations.description: Small wooden crucifix decorations, wooden benches, small and dim windows, wooden walls, vases on small pillars, plants near church entrance
locations.background: The church is a humble place of worship for a small and poor village. The local villagers don't have much and yet they place as much money into the church as they can.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: A slightly worn out wooden bench.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench is made out of oak wood, slightly worn out due to usage. Some initials are carved into the backrest, likely made by bored youths.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.examine_text: This crucifix appears to be hand carved. Its simplicity adds to its beauty. One feels a sense of calm looking at the depiction of Jesus Christ on the cross.

Vase.name: Vase
Vase.examine_text: The vase is made of ceramic. Despite its simplicity, it's rather elegant. It is filled with fresh flowers, which add to its charm.

Plant.name: Plant
Plant.examine_text: A small green plant in a terracotta pot. It has been well taken care of, as it is thriving despite the meager light available in the church.

Father Michael.name: Father Michael
Father Michael.description: A middle-aged man wearing a simple white cassock. He has kind eyes and a well-worn bible always in his hand.
Father Michael.persona: I am the local priest, always here for my congregation, helping them connect to their faith.
Father Michael.goal: My goal is to guide and help my flock to be enlightened and closer to God.

well-worn bible.name: Well-Worn Bible
well-worn bible.description: A very old and well-worn bible.
well-worn bible.examine_text: This Bible is old and worn, showing signs of many years of regular use. The leather binding is scratched and fading, and the pages are yellowed with age. Despite this, the text remains clear and legible. It's the kind of Bible that has been lovingly used for years.

rosary beads.name: Rosary Beads
rosary beads.description: A simple string of wooden rosary beads.
rosary beads.examine_text: The rosary is made of simple wooden beads on a string. Each bead has been worn smooth from use, and there is a small wooden cross at the end of the string. It's a simple and humble tool for prayer.

prayer book.name: Prayer Book
prayer book.examine_text: The prayer book is old and worn from use. The cover is made from simple brown leather, and the pages are yellowed with age. It contains prayers for different occasions, and has been used by Father Michael to guide many prayers over the years.

Old Widow Agnes.name: Old Widow Agnes
Old Widow Agnes.description: Agnes is an elderly lady dressed in black with a veil. She is seen praying fervently, with a rosary clutched tightly in her frail hands.
Old Widow Agnes.persona: I am a regular parishioner seeking comfort and solace in my prayers.
Old Widow Agnes.goal: My aim is to find peace and comfort in my faith and remember my late husband.

rosary.name: rosary
rosary.description: A string of beads for prayer, well-worn from use.
rosary.examine_text: The rosary is an assembly of tiny wooden beads stringed together. Each bead is smooth and polished from constant usage. The crucifix attached to the end reveals the careful craftmanship despite its weathered appearance.

handkerchief.name: handkerchief
handkerchief.examine_text: The handkerchief, although cotton and simple, is neatly embroidered with delicate flowers and leaves on the corners. It's stained with age and a clear sign of constant usage, which doesn't harm the elegance of its old world charm.

small photo of her late husband.name: small photo of her late husband
small photo of her late husband.description: A well-kept black and white picture of a chiseled man.
small photo of her late husband.examine_text: The photo is black and white, slightly discolored through the ages. The man in the picture has a warm smile and twinkling eyes that seem to be filled with stories. The picture, although touched by age, is carefully kept suggesting its immense emotional value.

Young Samuel.name: Young Samuel
Young Samuel.description: A young boy around 10 years old, dressed in choir robes, nervously shifting his sheet music.
Young Samuel.persona: I am a choir boy. I love singing, but I get nervous having to perform in front of the congregation.
Young Samuel.goal: I want to be able to sing perfectly at the next Sunday mass.

choir robes.name: Choir Robes
choir robes.description: A simple white robe worn by choir boys.
choir robes.examine_text: The robe is made of a coarse cloth, starchy but clean. It is adorned with a simple blue cross stitched onto the chest.

sheet music.name: Sheet Music
sheet music.description: Paper filled with musical notations for the choir.
sheet music.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the sheet music is filled with notations for ‘Amazing Grace’. The notes are written in a deliberate and careful hand, a testament to the love someone has put into this music.

squeaky voice.name: Squeaky Voice
squeaky voice.description: Young Samuel's light, high pitched singing voice.
squeaky voice.examine_text: Samuel's voice is still high from youth, and it cracks when he's nervous or excited. It’s not the strongest voice in the choir, but it holds its own melody.

locations.name: Paladins' Memorial Chapel
locations.description: The Paladins' Memorial Chapel is dominated by ornate mosaics made of thousands of tiny colored tiles in bright, vibrant colors which depict the heroic exploits of the Church's Paladins, including both victorious and tragic ones. The mosaics do not shy away from depicting bloodshed and gore. At the center is the shrine, which doubles as the Sarcophagus of the first Great Paladin. The chapel is always filled with white roses, which are reserved solely for the funerals of Paladins.
locations.background: The Paladins' Memorial Chapel was built to commemorate the lives and deaths of the Church's many devoted Paladins. It was funded by donations by both normal people saved by the Paladins me wealthy local merchants looking to expand their own renown by proximity. The tiles were all fashioned by local workshops, and took up so much time and material that the price of porcelain and other ceramics skyrocketed during its construction.

Ornate Mosaic.name: Ornate Mosaic
Ornate Mosaic.description: A large, vibrant mosaic depicting scenes of notable Paladin exploits.
Ornate Mosaic.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the mosaic is intricately detailed, with each tiny tile representing a part of a larger, grand picture. The Paladins depicted show expressions of determination and valor, capturing their courage and devotion to their faith.

Sarcophagus.name: Sarcophagus of the First Great Paladin
Sarcophagus.description: A grand sarcophagus at the center of the chapel.
Sarcophagus.examine_text: Made of pure marble, the sarcophagus is a work of art in itself. The exquisite carvings tell the story of the first Great Paladin and his courageous deeds. The top holds an almost life-sized statue of the Paladin in his full regalia, laying in eternal rest.

White Roses.name: White Roses
White Roses.description: A cluster of white roses, a symbol of a Paladin’s funeral.
White Roses.examine_text: The roses bathe the chapel in a lingering, sweet fragrance, a testament to the bounty of life each Paladin had safeguarded. Their stark whiteness emanates an aura of reverence, each rose in full bloom conveying a lost Paladin’s spirit.

Brother Eldric.name: Brother Eldric
Brother Eldric.description: Brother Eldric is an elderly priest, his once-dark hair now completely white. His back is a little hunched from years of hard work and devotion to the church, but his eyes are bright and thoughtful, filled with wisdom.
Brother Eldric.persona: I have dedicated my life to serving the great Paladins of our church. I keep their stories alive through prayers and ensure their sacrifices are not forgotten.
Brother Eldric.goal: My goal is to keep the memory of the Paladins alive and to inspire future generations to continue their noble work.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A worn leather-bound book, filled with prayers, elegies, and stories of the Paladins.
