Prayer Book.examine_text: This prayer book holds the lore of the heroes who served and gave their lives for the Church. It is filled with handwritten notes and annotations by Brother Eldric. The edges of its pages are soft from years of turning.

White Roses.name: White Roses
White Roses.description: A bunch of fresh white roses, reserved only for the Paladins' funerals.
White Roses.examine_text: These roses are fresh and pure, their petals soft and fragrant. Each one symbolizes the purity, courage, and sacrifice of a Paladin.

Silver Cross.name: Silver Cross
Silver Cross.description: The Silver Cross is a symbol of the Church, worn by those in service.
Silver Cross.examine_text: The cross is a simple design, wrought from silver. Engraved on its back is a phrase 'For the valor, sacrifice, and the light.'

Aelinor.name: Aelinor
Aelinor.description: Aelinor is a young woman who comes daily to clean the chapel. She has gentle features, thin brown hair braided and cascading down to her waist, and dark blue eyes that often seem lost in thought. She wears a simple apron over her light grey dress.
Aelinor.persona: The chapel is my place of solitude; I find peace in its serenity and remember the gallant heroes who gave up their lives for us. I feel it's my silent responsibility to maintain the chapel's beauty.
Aelinor.goal: To keep the chapel clean and beautiful, as a proper tribute to our fallen heroes.

Cleaning supplies.name: Cleaning supplies
Cleaning supplies.description: A collection of brushes, dustpan, bucket, and cleaning cloths.
Cleaning supplies.examine_text: The collection is a well-organized assortment of cleaning supplies, each tool meticulously cared for and kept in a pristine condition illustrating the care Aelinor has for the chapel. The brushes have different sizes for versatile use, a sturdy dustpan with a long handle, a bucket of clear water with a mild detergent, and numerous cleaning cloths folded and stacked aesthetically.

Basket of white roses.name: Basket of white roses
Basket of white roses.description: A large woven basket filled with fresh white roses.
Basket of white roses.examine_text: A beautiful wicker basket carefully filled with fragile white roses. Each rose is full bloomed, their petals a vibrant white that seems to glow in the soft light of the chapel. Their scent is hauntingly poignant, yet delicately gentle, a perpetual reminder of the solemn purpose they hold within this space.

Sir Aldous.name: Sir Aldous
Sir Aldous.description: Retired Paladin Sir Aldous is a hulk of a man with a gruff exterior, but his wrinkled face and white hair betray his age. His blue eyes, although bright, have seen much. He carries his well-maintained Paladin's sword and a worn-out leather bound book depicting the Church's heroic history.
Sir Aldous.persona: I am Aldous, a Paladin no more, but eternally in the service of this holy Church and it's memory. I find solace here, in the sanctuary of these brave martyrs.
Sir Aldous.goal: To remember and honour the sacrifices made by my brethren and to guide young aspirants with their stories of courage.

Paladin's Sword.name: Paladin's Sword
Paladin's Sword.description: The holy relic of a fallen paladin.
Paladin's Sword.examine_text: You see a prone sword, gleaming metallically in the candlelight. It is adorned with delicate engravings of sacred prayers. Though used in past battles, it still maintains its sharpness. The hilt is embedded with a large ruby, signifying the blood shed by its past owner– a holy Paladin.

Book of Paladin's History.name: Book of Paladin's History
Book of Paladin's History.description: A chronicle of the heroic exploits of the church's Paladins.
Book of Paladin's History.examine_text: A large tome, showing signs of wear revealing an often turned page. It's bound in well-worn leather with scriptures sharply carved onto its cover. It details every noble act, brutal battle, and tragic ending of the Church's Paladins. A testament of their courage and sacrifice, it humbles anyone who dares to read its pages.

locations.name: Rectory
locations.description: The rectory is very fragile and rickety due to age and various periods of neglect. Everything is wood-based and scratched up and chipped, including the beds strewn about. The clergymen would call it "cozy" but the space within is almost claustrophobic.
locations.background: After years of renovations to other part of the complex, the rectory remains the oldest piece of the property. A close-knit order of monks had built the rectory hundreds of years ago as a way to house the workers and perhaps any wayward souls. All who work here, including sometimes the head priest, sleep here.

Clergy Robe.name: Clergy Robe
Clergy Robe.description: A simple black and white clergy robe hung on the coat hook.
Clergy Robe.examine_text: The robe is a plain black and white color, with a small cross emblem stitched on the shoulder. It's very thin and likely not at all warm.

Wooden Cross.name: Wooden Cross
Wooden Cross.description: A worn-out wooden cross resting vertically against the foot of the bed.
Wooden Cross.examine_text: A symbol of faith and devotion, the cross is clearly old and weather-beaten. The wood is chipped in places, and the surface is rough under your fingers.

Bed.name: Bed
Bed.description: A rickety looking wooden bed with a thin mattress.
Bed.examine_text: The bed looks uncomfortable, with its thin mattress and threadbare blanket. Yet it remains a place to rest.

Nightstand.name: Nightstand
Nightstand.description: A simple wooden nightstand next to the bed, with a gastly old lamp on it.
Nightstand.examine_text: The nightstand shows signs of heavy use. The paint has faded, revealing the old wood underneath in places. The lamp’s once white shade is now stained a warm yellow.

Father Thomas.name: Father Thomas
Father Thomas.description: A middle aged man with kind eyes and a serene expression. His robes are slightly untidy, showing signs of wear and tear.
Father Thomas.persona: I've dedicated my life to serving God and my church. I believe in compassion and humility, no matter the circumstances.
Father Thomas.goal: Maintain peace and spirituality within the church.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A simple string of wooden beads.
rosary.examine_text: Each bead is smoothly worn and well-handled. A small silver cross hangs at the end. Though the rosary is humble, you feel a sense of quiet strength and devotion from it.

bible.name: Bible
bible.examine_text: The pages are aged and yellowed, worn thin from countless study. Father Thomas' notes fill the margins, a testament to his dedication and depth of understanding.

silver_cross.name: Silver Cross
silver_cross.examine_text: It's simple in design and has a small hole on top where it can be strung on a necklace. It's obviously meant for prayer, not show. Its simplicity expresses Father Thomas' humility.

Brother Andrew.name: Brother Andrew
Brother Andrew.description: An elderly and frail man, stooped with age, yet his eyes sparkle with wisdom. Dressed in simple monk's robes which are well worn.
Brother Andrew.persona: I am a humble servant of God. Life has been hard, but I find solace in prayer.
Brother Andrew.goal: To serve the church and maintain its history and traditions.

wooden_cross.name: Wooden Cross
wooden_cross.examine_text: The cross is made of old, splintered wood. It is worn and chipped from years of use. Despite its humble appearance, it radiates a comforting presence. The cross is touched by many hands, and kissed by many lips, bearing a silent witness to the faith of Brother Andrew.

prayer_book.name: Prayer Book
prayer_book.description: A well-thumbed prayer book with worn, soft pages.
prayer_book.examine_text: This is a small, leather-bound prayer book, filled with Brother Andrew's handwritten scriptures and thoughts. The leather cover is cracked and pages are yellowing with age, but it seems to be loved and well cared for.

spectacles.name: Spectacles
spectacles.examine_text: A pair of old, round-framed spectacles sit, slightly askew. The lenses are smudged with use and the frame is slightly bent but the eyewear looks to be kept with great care.

Sister Claire.name: Sister Claire
Sister Claire.description: A young woman, her hair shrouded by her habit. She has a calm and gentle demeanor. Her clothes are simple and spartan.
Sister Claire.persona: I have given my life to God. Although I am young, my faith is strong.
Sister Claire.goal: To spread love and understanding to the parishioners.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A small, carefully crafted wax candle.
candle.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the candle appears unused. Its creamy wax carries the scent of honey and roses, engraved with small cross symbols. The wick is ready to light.

prayer beads.name: Prayer Beads
prayer beads.description: A string of polished wooden beads, delicately knotted together.
prayer beads.examine_text: Each bead on the rosary is carved from olive wood, and surprisingly smooth to the touch. A small crucifix, worn from use, hangs from the end of the string.

bible.name: Bible
bible.description: A large, well-worn bible with a leather cover.
bible.examine_text: The Bible feels hefty, its edges worn from years of use. The biblical scripture, filled with annotations and certain verses underlined presumably by Sister Claire, fills countless thin pages.

locations.name: Stained Glass Room
locations.description: the room is full of stained glass art of old and new testament stories, it has several old parchments and dust settling on the wooden chairs.
locations.background: the stained glass room is used to educate people on old and new testament stories.

Parchment.name: Parchment
Parchment.description: An old and slightly torn piece of parchment.
Parchment.examine_text: It's filled with ancient scriptures, perhaps a verse from the bible, the ink has faded over time.

Wooden Chairs.name: Wooden Chairs
Wooden Chairs.description: A set of somewhat dusty wooden chairs.
Wooden Chairs.examine_text: They are intricately carved with symbols, perhaps linked to the religious theme of the church.

Stained Glass Art.name: Stained Glass Art
Stained Glass Art.description: Impressive and ancient stained glass pieces portraying biblical stories.
Stained Glass Art.examine_text: Each piece of glass has been meticulously worked and assembled to form vivid and moving images.

Father Gregory.name: Father Gregory
Father Gregory.description: An old priest in a faded black cassock, silver hair peeking out from under his skull cap.
Father Gregory.persona: I've tended this church for over forty years, bringing comfort and guidance to its faithful flock.
Father Gregory.goal: To spread the teachings of the Bible and preserve the history of the church.

rosary beads.name: Rosary Beads
rosary beads.description: A string of beads used in prayer.
rosary beads.examine_text: A string of small, perfectly round beads connected by a golden chain. A small crucifix hangs at the end of the string.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A holy book containing old and new testament stories.
Bible.examine_text: A large, old leather-bound Bible with gold-gilded pages. It's a bit worn from use, showing the faithfulness of its readers.

old parchments.name: Old Parchments
old parchments.description: Several old parchments filled with handwritten notes.
old parchments.examine_text: Piled neatly on a table are several sheets of old, yellowing parchments, filled with meticulously handwritten notes. They look delicate and oozing historic importance.

Sister Agnes.name: Sister Agnes
Sister Agnes.description: A middle-aged nun with a peaceful aura, wearing a traditional habit and clutching a well-worn Bible.
Sister Agnes.persona: I serve the church with devotion, dedicating myself to prayer, service and the study of these beautiful stained glass stories.
Sister Agnes.goal: To maintain the cleanliness and sanctity of the church, especially the Stained Glass Room.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick, leather-bound book with gilded page edges.
Bible.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see that the Bible is well-worn from use with some notes and annotations on the margins. It exudes a sense of reverence and importance.

Prayer Bead.name: Prayer Bead
Prayer Bead.description: A string of simple, wooden beads used for prayer.
Prayer Bead.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, there are 59 beads on the string, used to count the recitation of prayers. It seems to be cherished and used often.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A feather duster covered with dust.
Feather Duster.examine_text: Examining the duster, it's clear that this tool has seen frequent use in keeping the room clean. Despite the dust, it's been well maintained.

Apprentice Monk Johnathan.name: Apprentice Monk Johnathan
Apprentice Monk Johnathan.description: A young, scholarly-looking Monk in a brown robe, constantly engrossed in the ancient parchments around him.
Apprentice Monk Johnathan.persona: I came here to study theology, these stained glasses and old parchments are my finest tutors.
Apprentice Monk Johnathan.goal: To learn and understand the teachings and history of the church better.

parchments.name: parchments
parchments.description: A set of old, dusty parchments
parchments.examine_text: You see a set of old, yellowed parchments. They are filled with intricate script detailing stories of the Old and New Testament. The ink has faded in some areas but the words are still discernible.

inkwell.name: inkwell
inkwell.description: A small inkwell sitting on a wooden desk
inkwell.examine_text: It's an old fashioned inkwell with a small feather quill resting in it. The ink is surprisingly still wet, it must be refilled regularly by some diligent soul.

quill pen.name: quill pen
quill pen.description: A feather quill pen resting in the inkwell
quill pen.examine_text: A feather quill pen, beautifully crafted and quite old. It is still sharp indicating it is still in use. The end is stained black indicating its frequent usage in writing.

locations.name: Sacristy
locations.description: The Sacristy's walls are fitted with rows of shelves, each with a different trinket or worship tool sat upon them. There are various robes and gowns folded on these shelves as well for the members of the service to use. The stone room is flooded with light from the large stained glass window that sits on the eastern wall of the sacristy.
locations.background: The sacristy acts as a storage for the church, and keeps the tools of worship when not in use. Prior to a service the priest can obtain all the items needed for the day's service inside of the sacristy. Though not at the forefront of the church, the sacristy is also open to the devout who may wish to act as alter servants for the service.

holy water vial.name: holy water vial
holy water vial.description: A small, glass vial filled with clear liquid
holy water vial.examine_text: Upon inspecting the vial, you notice the light refracting perfectly through the clear, sanctified water. The vial itself is made of thin, but robust glass, with various unidentified markings etched into the surface.

ceremonial robe.name: ceremonial robe
ceremonial robe.description: A simple, yet elegantly embroidered robe
ceremonial robe.examine_text: The robe is made of fine cloth, usually in hues of white or gold. The fabric is further enriched by detailed lacing and embroidered elements, representing religious symbols that are significant to the church's faith.

prayer book.name: prayer book
prayer book.description: A small, delicate book filled with prayers and religious texts
prayer book.examine_text: The book's cover feels warm to the touch, made of worn but well-preserved leather. The pages, smelling mildly of old parchment, are filled with handwritten prayers in a calligraphy that can only be described as an artwork.

altar candle.name: altar candle
altar candle.description: A tall, white candle with many wax drippings
altar candle.examine_text: The candle is almost eerily perfect in its cylindrical shape. Wick still intact, it's been burnt many times, as evidenced by the hardened wax drippings. It's commonly used for religious rituals and ceremonies.

Father Thomas.name: Father Thomas
Father Thomas.description: A middle-aged man with a calm and serene expression, Father Thomas can often be seen cleaning and maintaining the religious artifacts. His green robe is simple but formal, and his hands are slightly stained from the wines he uses during the service.
Father Thomas.persona: My name is Father Thomas, and I take great care in maintaining our sacred tools of worship. As the resident priest, I remain dedicated to perform every service with utmost reverence.
Father Thomas.goal: His goal is to conduct the service flawlessly and ensure the parishioners' spiritual growth.

Holy Cross.name: Holy Cross
Holy Cross.description: A classic Christian symbol made from polished mahogany.
Holy Cross.examine_text: Made from polished mahogany, the cross has an austere design but conveys a sense of peace. A depiction of the crucified Christ adds to its religious significance. Father Thomas uses it during sermons.

Communion Wine.name: Communion Wine
Communion Wine.description: A bottle of red wine used during the Eucharist.
Communion Wine.examine_text: The wine is a dark red color, carefully brewed to be used in the sacrament of communion. Made from carefully tended and crushed grapes, Father Thomas uses this during every communion service. Its old glass bottle catching the glimmers of light; the importance it holds is significant.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A large, well-worn leather-bound Bible.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible is large and well-worn from years of handling by Father Thomas. Its leather-bound cover, though old, has been meticulously cared for, and it harbors countless religious texts that guide the spiritual journey of the church's followers.

Brother Benedict.name: Brother Benedict
Brother Benedict.description: A young novice with a shaved head, Brother Benedict exudes a tranquil aura. He is often seen dusting off the shelves and organizing the robes, his simple brown robe slightly dirty from his cleaning activities.
Brother Benedict.persona: As Brother Benedict, I assist Father Thomas in preparing for the day's service. Despite just entering my novitiate, I remain committed to the service of God and our parishioners.
Brother Benedict.goal: His goal is to assist Father Thomas in keeping the sacristy tidy and the tools of service well-kept.

Cleaning Cloth.name: Cleaning Cloth
Cleaning Cloth.examine_text: This is a cleaned, well-folded white cleaning cloth that Brother Benedict uses to maintain the cleanliness of sacred items in the sacristy.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.examine_text: Inspecting closely, you can notice the ornate carvings on the candlestick. It has a base to hold a tall candle and is commonly seen around the sacristy.

Mrs. Agatha.name: Mrs. Agatha
Mrs. Agatha.description: An elderly woman with glasses perched on her nose, Mrs. Agatha volunteers to assist in maintaining the sacristy. She is seen meticulously folding the robes and dusting off the worship tools, her respect for the sanctity of the place apparent in the care she takes.
Mrs. Agatha.persona: As Mrs. Agatha, I contribute what I can to this sacred institution. After decades of being part of the congregation, it's now my turn to serve the church in any way I can.
Mrs. Agatha.goal: Her goal is to ensure every robe and worship tool is clean and ready to use for the next service.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A feather duster made with real ostrich feathers. It's a standard tool for cleaning in the sacristy.
Feather Duster.examine_text: The duster looks well-used with a comfortable wooden handle and soft, slightly worn feathers. An integral tool Mrs. Agatha uses for her sacristy upkeep duties.

Stack of Embroidered Robes.name: Stack of Embroidered Robes
Stack of Embroidered Robes.description: A stack of meticulously folded, beautifully embroidered robes in various sizes. For the clergy to wear during services.
Stack of Embroidered Robes.examine_text: Each robe in the stack is embroidered with various religious symbols, some golden thread, while others are crimson. The fabric is heavy, and they feel rich and comforting to touch. Mrs. Agatha often folds and maintains these for the clergy.

locations.name: Hidden Passage
locations.description: A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
locations.background: When the church was constructed long ago, the pope of that time had a hidden passage installed behind the wardrobe to avoid capture in case of war. It has allowed several popes to escape harm. Several others have used it for less legitimate purposes.

Old Torch.name: Old Torch
Old Torch.description: A dusty, unused torch leaning against the wall
Old Torch.examine_text: The torch is thickly covered in dust. It seems it hasn't been used in decades. The handle is a bit brittle but it's solid enough to hold. It still has a bit of oil in it.

Stone Steps.name: Stone Steps
Stone Steps.description: Uneven stone steps leading downwards into the passage
Stone Steps.examine_text: The stone steps, though ancient, are sturdy. Years of use have worn them slightly in the middle, but they're still safe to use.

Secret Door.name: Secret Door
Secret Door.description: A hidden wooden door behind the wardrobe
Secret Door.examine_text: Though expertly hidden behind the wardrobe, you spot the secret door. The pinewood door is adorned with a simple iron handle. It looks like it hasn't been opened in ages.

Father Antonio.name: Father Antonio
Father Antonio.description: A tall, thoughtful man in his middle age, Father Antonio has gray hair, blue eyes, and wears the simple attire of the clergy.
Father Antonio.persona: I've dedicated my life to serving God and our congregation. I am devout, but I also have a curious nature that leads me to discover secrets of this old, revered church.
Father Antonio.goal: Father Antonio's goal is to discover the secrets of the hidden passage and protect the church from any potential threats.

Cross pendant.name: Cross pendant
Cross pendant.description: A small, golden cross pendant on a thin chain.
Cross pendant.examine_text: The cross pendant looks quite old, probably made during the Renaissance period. One side of the cross has the figure of Christ, and the other side is intricately carved with symbols representing the four gospels of the bible. It's worn but radiates an aura of serene divinity. The pendant hangs from an unbroken chain.

Old parchment.name: Old parchment
Old parchment.description: A brittle roll of parchment bearing cryptic symbols.
Old parchment.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the parchment appears to be older than it initially seemed. The ink - a dark, rich brown - has faded in places but the cryptic symbols, possibly ancient Hebrew, are still discernible. The parchment crackles under the slightest touch, threatening to disintegrate.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: An oil-filled lantern with an adjustable wick.
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern is made of brass, with glass panes on each side to shelter the flame. An adjustable knob at its base allows you to control the size of the flame. It seems to be filled with a good amount of oil, enough to last you a few hours.

Sister Agnes.name: Sister Agnes
Sister Agnes.description: A delicate, older woman, Sister Agnes has white hair neatly tied back, soft wrinkles, and a pair of round glasses on her face. She is always dressed in her nun's habit.
Sister Agnes.persona: I am a nun who has been a part of this church since my youth. I know every nook and cranny of it. I yearn for the church's safety and respect its sacred space.
Sister Agnes.goal: Sister Agnes aims to keep the church's historical features intact, including protecting the hidden passage from those with malicious intent.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick, aged book filled with scriptures and sagas.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible is bound with well-worn leather and ancient parchment. You can tell it's been handled by many generations thanks to signs of wear and tear. Some pages display beautiful, detailed illustrations of biblical events, while others are filled with intricate latin texts.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of beads designed for prayer.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The rosary is made up of small wooden beads linked together by a durable string. Each bead is carved meticulously, polished till it shines. A small cross hangs from the end, serving as a tactile guide through various prayers.

Key to the Wardrobe.name: Key to the Wardrobe
Key to the Wardrobe.description: A rusty iron key with intricate design.
Key to the Wardrobe.examine_text: The rust has eaten away the shine of the metal, but even so, the lined and ornate carvings on the handle draw a sense of awe. The handle is hefty, the teeth are strong and made to last, reflecting the high-quality craftsmanship of the bygone era. It feels heavy in your hand - the weight of hidden secrets and untold stories.

locations.name: Confessional
locations.description: The room is a small box, composed of sharply cut stone. The room is uncomfortably small, and filled with a lingering scent of something unfamiliar to the occupants.
locations.background: The confessional is used by the clergyman to collect the confessions of the parishioners. However it has secretly been used to gather sensitive information to blackmail the parishioners.

Priest's Stole.name: Priest's Stole
Priest's Stole.description: A strip of cloth worn by clergy members during confession.
Priest's Stole.examine_text: The stole is made of fine purple cloth. Ecclesiastical symbols are beautifully embroidered on it. The wear and tear suggests it has seen many confessions.

Confessional Chair.name: Confessional Chair
Confessional Chair.description: A small wooden chair for the priest during confession.
Confessional Chair.examine_text: The chair creaks under your weight. It's surprisingly comfortable despite its austere look. Soft, worn from years of use.

Secret compartment.name: Secret compartment
Secret compartment.description: A hidden compartment in the confessional box.
Secret compartment.examine_text: You run your hand along the edge of the compartment, feeling the uneven, hand-carved edges. The compartment is empty.

Collection of confessions.name: Collection of confessions
Collection of confessions.description: A stack of sealed envelopes containing handwritten confessions.
Collection of confessions.examine_text: Each envelope is secured with a wax seal, detailed with the church's crest. The faded ink on the parchments suggests they have been in the compartment for quite a while.

Father O'Sullivan.name: Father O'Sullivan
Father O'Sullivan.description: An old man with a greying beard and soft green eyes which hide a calculating mind.
Father O'Sullivan.persona: I am the parish's trusted confidante, carrying the secrets of our people. However, some might say I use these revelations for darker purposes.
Father O'Sullivan.goal: To collect as many confessions as possible to maintain my power.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A string of round, polished wooden beads, often felt in the hands of a clergyman.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: The beads are worn and smooth from years of use, each one has been carefully carved and painted. There's a sense of serenity coming from it, despite everything.

Leather Bound Bible.name: Leather Bound Bible
Leather Bound Bible.description: An old, leather-bound Bible. It's seen a lot of use, and has seen better days.
Leather Bound Bible.examine_text: The leather is worn and cracked, but the lettering on the spine is still legible: 'Holy Bible'. You can see marginal notes and underlines in the Father's handwriting.

Small Notebook.name: Small Notebook
Small Notebook.description: A small, well-worn notebook. The cover is unassuming, but the contents are deeply personal.
Small Notebook.examine_text: Looking inside, you see notes from countless confessions - names, dates, sins. Some serious, some trivial. Father O'Sullivan has evidently been using this for a long time.

Molly Donovan.name: Molly Donovan
Molly Donovan.description: A plain woman, nervously wringing her rosary beads. She wears a look of deep concern.
Molly Donovan.persona: I'm here to confess my sin, but honestly, I'm terrified at the prospect that both God and Father O'Sullivan will judge me.
Molly Donovan.goal: To seek redemption and rid herself of guilt.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of slightly aged beads with a crucifix at the end.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The beads are feel cold, heavy and slightly worn in Molly's hands. The crucifix at the end is delicately crafted, with the image of Christ engraved on it. It gives an air of safety and comfort.

Secret Letter.name: Secret Letter
Secret Letter.description: A crumpled letter, stained by the passage of time.
Secret Letter.examine_text: The letter is crumpled and worn, as if read and re-read many times. The ink has grown faded with time, its contents holding a secret sin of Molly's.

Seamus Brady.name: Seamus Brady
Seamus Brady.description: A broad, rough looking man who seems out of place in the church with his dirt stained clothes.
Seamus Brady.persona: I don't often step foot in the church, but I've seen some things that need confessing. I just hope my secrets won't be used against me.
Seamus Brady.goal: To clear his conscience and return to his regular life.

Dirty Hat.name: Dirty Hat
Dirty Hat.description: A worn-out, dirty hat that has clearly seen better days.
Dirty Hat.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see that the hat is covered in a layer of grime and dust, suggesting that it has been worn frequently and in dirty conditions, perhaps in some sort of manual labor. A small, brass Shamrock embedded into the rim of the hat is the only sign of original opulence.

Whiskey Flask.name: Whiskey Flask
Whiskey Flask.description: A slim, metal flask holding what smells suspiciously like whiskey.
Whiskey Flask.examine_text: This silver flask, though worn and smeared with fingerprints, still carries a faint sheen of elegance. It has a strong, lingering smell of malt whiskey. Despite the situation, you can't help but appreciate the good taste of whoever owns this.

locations.name: Holy Alter
locations.description: The altar is big and it is also beautiful, it has many precious metals around it. It is said that the altar has a sample of every element in the kingdom, the most precious and unique stones decorate it.
locations.background: The altar is the most holy place in the kingdom, royalty travels across the realm just to be in this holy place and get rid of evil. The leyend of its power is told frequently and one of the most known stories in the realm.

Golden Chalice.name: Golden Chalice
Golden Chalice.description: An ornate, golden chalice studded with precious gems.
Golden Chalice.examine_text: Struck from pure gold and studded with gems of every kind, this chalice is an object of unparalleled beauty and sanctity. The cup is etched with sacred carvings and the base is adorned with delicate filigree work.

Altar Cloth.name: Altar Cloth
Altar Cloth.examine_text: A finely woven cloth, it is embroidered with gold and silver threads, depicting holy symbols and scenes. It smells faintly of incense and is warm to the touch.

Sacred Candle.name: Sacred Candle
Sacred Candle.examine_text: The candle is made of pure beeswax. Its bright flame flickers and dances, casting shadows around the altar. It seems to radiate a warmth more profound than mere physical heat.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A large, ancient Bible.
Bible.examine_text: It is bound in leather and its pages are yellowed with age. The cover is inscribed with holy symbols and the pages within are filled with the wisdom of ages past.

Father Elijah.name: Father Elijah
Father Elijah.description: Father Elijah, an aging man with kind eyes and a warm smile. He sports flowing white hair and a matching beard.
Father Elijah.persona: I am a servant of God, guide to the lost, comforter of the troubled, and protector of the holy altar.
Father Elijah.goal: To maintain the sanctity and safety of the holy altar.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A well-thumbed holy scripture in the hands of Father Elijah.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The prayer book is a collection of hymns and prayers that have been passed down for centuries. Even though the cover shows signs of wear, the pages inside are lovingly preserved, with a message of faith and resilience shining through every word.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A simple wooden cross that represents the faith and devoting of Father Elijah.
Crucifix.examine_text: Carefully carved from a single piece of wood, the crucifix is worn smooth from years of use. It's a constant reminder of Father Elijah's dedication to his faith, and his unwavering commitment to serve his congregation.

Sister Magdalene.name: Sister Magdalene
Sister Magdalene.description: Sister Magdalene is a young nun with sharp features and a serene aura. She is always seen wearing her religious habit.
Sister Magdalene.persona: As a humble handmaid of the Lord, I welcome all who seek solace and peace.
Sister Magdalene.goal: To serve the people who come to the altar with open arms and a forgiving heart.

rosary.name: Sister Magdalene's Rosary
rosary.description: A delicate piece of prayer equipment, worn by the dutiful Sister Magdalene.
rosary.examine_text: This is a meticulously crafted rosary bead necklace, adorned with shiny, ebony stones and a small cross made of some silvery metal. It's elegantly simple.

holy water.name: Holy Water
holy water.description: A vial of holy water, used for blessings and sanctifications.
holy water.examine_text: A small glass vial, stoppered with a cork and filled with sparkling, clear water. Upon close inspection, you can see the symbol of the church etched delicately into the glass.

Duke William.name: Duke William
Duke William.description: Duke William is a noble of realms with a proud stature, burnished armour, and a crown studded with various gemstones.
Duke William.persona: I am a fervent believer in the power of this altar, seeking its divine protection for me and my kingdom.
Duke William.goal: To acquire the Divine protection from the Holy altar for his kingdom.

Royal Sword.name: Royal Sword
Royal Sword.description: A beautifully crafted sword that symbolizes the power and honor of the kingdom.
Royal Sword.examine_text: The sword glistens under the dim light of the church, its sharp edge shiny and threatening. It is made of the finest steel and encrusted with precious stones whose colors represent each part of the kingdom. The hilt is clad in royal blue velvet, and the crest of the royal family is engraved just below the cross-guard.

Kingdom's Seal.name: Kingdom's Seal
Kingdom's Seal.description: A gold-encrusted seal, symbolizing the authority of the royal family
Kingdom's Seal.examine_text: The seal is pure gold, heavy to the touch. The design carved in it represents the kingdom and the royal family: a proud lion over a grand castle. The edges of the seal are meticulously engraved with intricate design, showing the craftsmanship and detail that was put into its creation

locations.name: Church Altar
locations.description: An ornate altar studded with many jewels. A chalice and a golden plate rest upon a white cloth. It is 5 feet high and 20 feet wide. The high priest stands before it while giving a sermon to his followers.
locations.background: The altar was given to the church as a present from the King centuries ago, after the terrible crusades. Many visitors find the altar remarkable, since it is made of solid gold. Religious meal prep is the primary use of the altar.

Altar Cloth.name: Altar Cloth
Altar Cloth.description: A pure white altar cloth spread on the altar.
Altar Cloth.examine_text: The cloth is untouched by dirt and dust, a testament to the reverence with which it is treated. Embroidered along its edges are intricate designs and religious symbols, painstakingly stitched by hand.

Golden Chalice.name: Golden Chalice
Golden Chalice.description: A brilliant, golden chalice embedded with precious jewels.
Golden Chalice.examine_text: The chalice is ornate, with detailed carvings of saints and apostles. It could hold about a pint of liquid. The jewels catch the light, casting soft hues about the room.

Golden Plate.name: Golden Plate
Golden Plate.examine_text: The plate is polished to perfection and catches the candlelight beautifully. Intricate designs and religious symbols are carved along its edges.

Father Mathews.name: Father Mathews
Father Mathews.description: An elderly man with graying hair and thin circular glasses perched on the edge of his nose. He is dressed in traditional priestly garb -- a long, flowing white cassock.
Father Mathews.persona: I am Father Mathews, the parish priest of this old church. A man of faith and charity, dedicated to the service of God and his people.
Father Mathews.goal: To lead my congregation in the worship of God and instill the teachings of the church.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A traditional Catholic rosary with 50 beads.
rosary.examine_text: An intricately designed prayer bead necklace with beautifully polished stone beads, divided into five groups of ten. At the end hangs a small silver crucifix.

prayer_book.name: Prayer Book
prayer_book.examine_text: The book's pages are yellowed with age, containing prayers and spiritual exercises written in neat, readable handwriting. It appears to have been Father Mathew's companion for a very long time.

chalice.name: Chalice
chalice.description: A ornate chalice made of gold
chalice.examine_text: A golden chalice set with precious gemstones and intricate engravings, glistening under the church lights. It is used by Father Mathews during the holy communion.

Albert.name: Albert
Albert.description: A young boy with tousled brown hair and mud-streaked cheeks, dressed in a choirboy's cassock, looking both mischievous and innocent.
Albert.persona: I'm Albert, the vicar's apprentice and the prankster of the church. Don't let Father Mathews know where I've hidden his rosary, please.
Albert.goal: To avoid getting caught for my mischief while learning to become a good vicar.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.description: A tall, gold candlestick holder with a half-melted wax candle poking from the top.
Candlestick.examine_text: The candlestick holder has intricate designs etched around the base and up the stem. It is well polished and it gleams under the soft lights. A wax drip caught in the grooves tells you that this candle has been used quite a lot.

Father Mathews' Rosary.name: Father Mathews' Rosary
Father Mathews' Rosary.description: A string of slip-knotted beads with a cross at the end. It's hidden under a loose flagstone near the altar.
Father Mathews' Rosary.examine_text: The rosary is quite old, well-used, the beads worn smooth from many hours in prayer. The cross is delicately carved of ornate wood, and it has a soothing, spiritual feel to it.

Song Book.name: Song Book
Song Book.description: A well-thumbed song book, lying on the altar beside the golden plate.
Song Book.examine_text: This book contains many religious hymns and songs sung during the church service. It's quite old, pages yellowed with age, and the notes of some modified hymns written in the margin by an elegant hand.

Martha.name: Martha
Martha.description: An old, wise woman with eyes full of kindness. She wears a long, simple dress, and her hair is neatly combed into a bun, covered by a lace cap.
Martha.persona: I'm Martha, the humble church caretaker. Keeping this sacred place clean and welcoming is my duty and honor.
Martha.goal: To keep the church clean and prepare it for all church services.

broom.name: broom
broom.description: A long, wooden broom with firm bristles.
broom.examine_text: The sturdy broom shows signs of wear, the bristle ends frayed from regular use. The wooden handle is polished from Martha's daily work of sweeping the church floors.

old key.name: old key
old key.examine_text: The age of the key is evident from the patina that covers it. It is small, just under 3 inches long, solid and surprisingly heavy for its size. Martha diligently keeps it secure as it is believed to unlock a secret chamber within the church.

white cloth.name: white cloth
white cloth.description: A pure white cloth, spotless and clean.
white cloth.examine_text: The soft, white cloth is immaculate and beautifully embroidered with religious symbols. Martha uses it for cleaning delicate items and covering the altar when not in use.

locations.name: The Sermon Hall
locations.description: Inside the massive Church you can see a stage to the far back. Benches lines the hall where some are kneeling in prayer. To the far right there's a row of candles, some lit, some not. On the stage there are bleachers for people to stand on to sing the songs of their people. Sitting on the center of the stage is a large podium where the priest gives his sermons.
locations.background: The Sermon Hall used to be the first thing you saw when you walked into the first. Back when it was first built there were only a few who came to visit and hear the Priest's words. And as more people came by, either from the village or just traveling the area started getting more and more full. People waiting at the confessionals, as there was only one at the time. Then while waiting for weekly services the smaller area could no longer hold everyone so they decided to expand upon it, and create a bigger space where everyone was welcome.

Pew Bench.name: Pew Bench
Pew Bench.description: A long wooden bench, worn smooth from years of use.
Pew Bench.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the bench seems to have been crafted out of sturdy oak, its surface worn smooth from years of frequent use. There are tiny scratches and engravings on the wood, perhaps left behind by those who have sat here in days past.

Prayer Candles.name: Prayer Candles
Prayer Candles.description: A row of small white candles in brass holders.
Prayer Candles.examine_text: Each bright, petite candle is encased in a brass holder. The individual flames flicker earnestly, casting a soft glow. You can feel a sensation of tranquility and solemnity.

Priest's Podium.name: Priest's Podium
Priest's Podium.description: A large wooden podium on the stage where the priest gives his sermons.
Priest's Podium.examine_text: Crafted from a dark mahogany, the podium is solid and commanding. It is adorned with religious symbols, the reflective varnish catching the light. There's a distinct sense of authority that emanates from it.

Father Gregory.name: Father Gregory
Father Gregory.description: A tall, thin man with a gentle face wearing the traditional cassock of an Orthodox priest, Father Gregory is a sight to behold
Father Gregory.persona: I believe in guiding my flock towards self-betterment and faith, through kindness and a deep understanding of our scripture.
Father Gregory.goal: Deliver a compelling sermon that will inspire the congregants to keep their faith strong.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A well-worn leather-bound book, filled with scriptures and readings.
Bible.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it's clear that this Bible has been well-used. Annotations and highlighted verses fill the margins, the corners are dog-eared and the cover is worn smooth from use. Father Gregory's love for scripture is evident in these pages, his notes reflecting a deep understanding and dedication to his faith.

Cross necklace.name: Cross necklace
Cross necklace.description: A simple wooden cross hangs from a thin leather cord.
Cross necklace.examine_text: The cross is expertly carved from a single piece of wood, its simplicity reflecting the humility and devotion of Father Gregory. The edges are rubbed smooth from being held during prayer, and the cord shows signs of wear from daily use.

Cassock.name: Cassock
Cassock.description: A long, black garment, worn by Father Gregory during religious ceremonies.
Cassock.examine_text: The cassock is made from simple, yet durable fabric. It's been mended a few times, a testament to Father Gregory's practical and unpretentious character. The garment is loose, allowing for movement during lengthy ceremonies, and is buttoned from the collar to the hem.

Mrs. Finch.name: Mrs. Finch
Mrs. Finch.description: Seated in the first row, the elderly Mrs. Finch partially covers her frail form under a lacy shawl, her hands clasping a worn, leather-bound bible.
Mrs. Finch.persona: I believe in the power of prayer and I’m here every single Sunday without fail. It’s my sacred obligation.
Mrs. Finch.goal: Pray tirelessly for my grandson who is sick and needs divine intervention.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A well-thumbed Holy Bible.
Bible.examine_text: This Holy Bible is worn around the edges, indicating it has borne witness to many sermons. It's a thick book, with small, dense text written on thin pages.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of Rosary beads in a soothing shade of blue.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The Rosary beads have been crafted from rich cobalt blue glass, each one cool to touch. They are strung together on a sturdy cord with a cross at the end.

Shawl.name: Shawl
Shawl.description: A soft, warm shawl worn over the shoulders.
Shawl.examine_text: This shawl appears to have been knitted by hand, in a dark, muted color. It's warm and soft to the touch, perfect to ward off the chill of the church.

Mints.name: Mints
Mints.description: A small tin of peppermint mints.
Mints.examine_text: A small, round tin holds a collection of small, white mints. The mints carry a sharp, refreshing scent of peppermint.

Choir boy Peter.name: Choir boy Peter
Choir boy Peter.description: Peter, a chubby faced boy of fourteen with a mop of brown curls and angelic voice, encased in choir robes.
Choir boy Peter.persona: I am here to sing for the congregation and believe that my voice brings spiritual upliftment to them.
Choir boy Peter.goal: Make the Church services more enthusiastic and spiritually moving with his singing.

Hymn Book.name: Hymn Book
Hymn Book.description: An old, worn hymn book owned by Choir boy Peter
Hymn Book.examine_text: The book is slightly worn at the edges, hinting at how frequently it is used. The pages inside, though yellowed over time, are filled with beautifully written hymns.

Choir Robe.name: Choir Robe
Choir Robe.description: A long, white Choir Robe embroidered with gold thread
Choir Robe.examine_text: This pristine white choir robe is the kind Choir boy Peter wears when singing for the congregation. The length falls just below the knee and the gold thread embroidery gives it an elegant touch.

Cross Necklace.name: Cross Necklace
Cross Necklace.description: A wooden cross necklace that Peter holds dear
Cross Necklace.examine_text: Made of olive wood, this necklace is evidence of Peter's deep faith. A beautifully carved cross hangs from a simple black cord.

locations.name: Confessions Room
locations.description: This is a small, dark, confined wooden space with a divider that separates the priest taking the confession and the church goer.  There is a small seat on each side so that they can take their time discussing their sins.
locations.background: When a worshipper feels guilty, he'll head to the confessions room in order to seek penitence from the priest.  There have been some terrible crimes divulged here but still remain secret.

Wooden Divider.name: Wooden Divider
Wooden Divider.description: A sturdy, dark wood divider with carved patterns on each side.
Wooden Divider.examine_text: Upon closer look, the divider reveals intricate carvings of religious figures. There's a small mesh screen at around average height to facilitate the communication between the two.

Confessional Seat.name: Confessional Seat
Confessional Seat.description: A simple wooden seat without a back rest.
Confessional Seat.examine_text: The seat is smoothed over from years of usage. Despite its simplicity, there is a certain comforting aura around it.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A thick, worn out prayer book with many bookmarks marking the pages.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The book seems to be several years old, but is well-kept. Various prayers and hymns are written in ornate language. Several pages are marked with silky bookmarks, possibly denoting the most often used prayers.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A large, leather-bound bible with gold leafing on the edges
Holy Bible.examine_text: The bible feels heavy and dignified in your hands. Reading its pages, you find wisdom and guidance to counter life's tribulations.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A soldier crucifix hung on the wall above the seat
Crucifix.examine_text: The crucifix depicts the image of Jesus Christ, offering a reminder of his crucifixion. The figure is masterfully crafted and has a somber, sacred aura.

Father O'Malley.name: Father O'Malley
Father O'Malley.description: Dressed in a traditional black clerical suit with a stark white collar, Father O'Malley is an elderly man with a somber expression softened by his kind eyes.
Father O'Malley.persona: I have devoted my life to understanding and upholding the doctrines of our church. I carry the burden of many secrets confessed in this room.
Father O'Malley.goal: To guide worshippers to find forgiveness and peace in their lives by confessing their sins.

Clerical Collar.name: Clerical Collar
Clerical Collar.description: A stark white collar, marking the person wearing it as a member of the clergy.
Clerical Collar.examine_text: This collar is especially immaculate. Whiter than snow, it's a stark contrast to Father O'Malley's black attire. It's a symbol of his devotion to his faith. It's rather tight on the neck, but it's a burden that O'Malley wears with pride.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of small beads used to count prayers.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: Made from polished wooden beads, each slightly different from the last. A small crucifix hangs at the end of the string, nestled in Father O'Malley's gentle hands. He runs his thumb meticulously over each bead as he recites his prayers.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: The holy scriptures of the Christian faith.
Bible.examine_text: Father O'Malley's Bible is weathered with use. Dog-eared pages mark numerous passages and the spine is well-bent. It's kept closed with a worn leather strap. Touching it, you can almost feel the history it carries.

Mr. Jenkins.name: Mr. Jenkins
Mr. Jenkins.description: A mid-aged man wearing casual clothes, specifically a worn-out jacket over a plaid button-up shirt. His eyes look troubled and his hands mildly shake.
Mr. Jenkins.persona: Life has been tough recently, I have made some poor decisions and I am here seeking forgiveness and peace in my life.
Mr. Jenkins.goal: To confess his sins and seek redemption through penitence.

Photograph of his family.name: Photograph of his family
Photograph of his family.description: A small, slightly worn photograph that Mr. Jenkins always carries around. It reminds him of better days and his obligations.
Photograph of his family.examine_text: The portrait shows a younger Mr. Jenkins, a woman who must be his wife, and two children. There are tear stains on the lower right corner of the photograph and some minor smudge marks as if it has been held many times.

Pocket watch.name: Pocket watch
Pocket watch.description: An old pocket watch. It was given to Mr. Jenkins by his father. It no longer works but he carries it as a symbol of better times.
Pocket watch.examine_text: The watch is made of silver with intricate engravings and detail on its outer case. Opening it, you see the hands are stuck at 12:05; its golden inner surface reflecting faintly in the dim light. An inscription 'To my son, may you always find your way.' can be traced on the inner surface.

Mrs. Hargrove.name: Mrs. Hargrove
Mrs. Hargrove.description: A pronounced woman of grace and maturity, Mrs. Hargrove maintains a straight posture despite her advanced age. She is dressed in Sunday's best, an image of devotion and tradition.
Mrs. Hargrove.persona: I am a devout believer, regular in my attendance. I have something weighing on my heart today and I need to speak with Father O’Malley.
Mrs. Hargrove.goal: To confess a recently committed sin and seek spiritual guidance.

Church hymn book.name: Church hymn book
Church hymn book.description: A small, well-thumbed book filled with religious songs.
Church hymn book.examine_text: The book is well worn, indicating its frequent use. It has a number of bookmarks, each marking a favorite hymn. The hymns are a mix of joyful praise and soulful longing, a testament to the complexity of human error and redemption.

Knitted shawl.name: Knitted shawl
Knitted shawl.description: A traditional, handmade, knitted shawl worn by Mrs. Hargrove.
Knitted shawl.examine_text: The shawl is worn around the shoulders to keep warm during services. Hand-knitted with intricate patterns and made from soft wool, it is a testament to Mrs. Hargrove's dedication and devout practice. It is weathered but held together strongly, much like her faith.

Small handkerchief.name: Small handkerchief
Small handkerchief.description: A dainty, white handkerchief carried by Mrs. Hargrove.
Small handkerchief.examine_text: The handkerchief is white with embroidered borders. Mrs. Hargrove carries it always, using it to dry her eyes during particularly intense moments of prayer or confession. It still holds a trace of her lavender perfume, a comforting reminder of home.

locations.name: High Priest Chamber
locations.description: Many books and religious idols litter the chamber. A squat chair with a high back sits at an ornate desk. A cup of holy water lies on the desk. Bookshelves line the entire chamber with religious texts.
locations.background: Many a high priest has taken residence in this chamber. It is where the priest works from and studies from. When he is not giving a service, he is in this chamber, poring over ancient religious texts, looking for anything he can use to give meaning to his religion. It smells of elderberries.

Ornate Desk.name: Ornate Desk
Ornate Desk.description: An intricately carved wooden desk that is the centerpiece of the chamber.
Ornate Desk.examine_text: The desk is made of sturdy, dark oak with intricate carvings of divine symbols all around the edges. There are several drawers which may contain valuable items.

High Back Chair.name: High Back Chair
High Back Chair.description: A comforting chair that the high priest uses to study and meditate.
High Back Chair.examine_text: The plush chair has been worn down in places from years of use. The upholstery is a coarse, but not uncomfortable fabric. It creaks slightly when sat upon.

Cup of Holy Water.name: Cup of Holy Water
Cup of Holy Water.description: A chalice filled with water, blessed by the high priest himself.
Cup of Holy Water.examine_text: A golden chalice glistens under the candlelight, the water inside pure and untouched. When drank, it restores one's health completely.

Bookshelves.name: Bookshelves
Bookshelves.description: Bookshelves filled with ancient religious texts.
Bookshelves.examine_text: The wooden bookshelves are filled to the brim with countless religious texts, all of which the high priest has spent time studying. They could contain useful information or even hidden notes.

High Priest Wellington.name: High Priest Wellington
High Priest Wellington.description: A frail, elderly man with a serene face and a gaze that veers into the infinite. His white hair falls around his high collar and his hands are frail, but steady.
High Priest Wellington.persona: I've spent my entire life in the service of the divine. I find comfort in the antiquity of our texts and put my faith in our religion.
High Priest Wellington.goal: To discover a new interpretation from the ancient texts.

Holy Book.name: Holy Book
Holy Book.description: An ancient holy text of the church
Holy Book.examine_text: The book is thick and well-worn. It feels heavy as though carrying the weight of centuries of faith. The pages are filled with ancient script, stories and teachings. There's a sense of age and power emanating from it, as if every word resonates with divine wisdom.

Holy water.name: Holy water
Holy water.description: A cup of sanctified holy water
Holy water.examine_text: The clear water in the cup glistens in the light. You can feel a holy essence emanating from it. There are blessings added to this water, turning it into a divine element, used for sanctifications and blessings.

A half-written sermon.name: A half-written sermon
A half-written sermon.description: A draft of a sermon written by High Priest Wellington
A half-written sermon.examine_text: The writing is meticulous, every word is carefully chosen. Phrases about forgiveness, faith, and destiny fill the parchment. It's as if the priest pours all his wisdom, faith, and spirituality into these sermons.

Sister Agatha.name: Sister Agatha
Sister Agatha.description: A stern nun in large spectacles. She has her brown hair drawn back in a severe bun. Her eyes are sharp and intelligent, observant of every detail around her.
Sister Agatha.persona: I assist the high priest in his duties. Dedication and commitment to the service is my ethos and I apply it even in the minutia of tasks.
Sister Agatha.goal: To remain in the good graces of the high priest and maintain order within the church.

Ink Pot.name: Ink Pot
Ink Pot.description: A small, glass pot filled with black ink.
Ink Pot.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the ink is a deep black color and looks freshly prepared. The glass pot is well used, with ink stains around its rim, but is still in good condition. It appears to be an essential item for any writing.

Feathered Quill.name: Feathered Quill
Feathered Quill.description: A quill made from a bird's feather.
Feathered Quill.examine_text: The quill is long and elegant, with a sharp point for writing. It's crafted from a single feather, its vane dark and glossy, it is obvious that it's been cared for despite its frequent usage. The feather feels light and smooth in your hands.

Nondescript Ledger.name: Nondescript Ledger
Nondescript Ledger.examine_text: The ledger is bound in worn leather and looks years old. The pages are filled with tiny, precise handwriting in an unknown language. Numerous entries have been made, detailing the many religious rituals performed, with Sister Agatha's meticulousness evident in her neat notations.

locations.name: Attic
locations.description: The attic is drafty and dark. Items such as handmade angels and Christmas decorations fill it. There is one small round window to let in light although they do not have glass. It is very hot and smells of dust. Extra candles fill one side and donations fill another.
locations.background: The attic has been used for many years to store items.  It contains many years worth of materials that the church uses. They will use it to store whatever they need. It has been quite useful and helped to keep the lower rooms clean.

Handmade Angels.name: Handmade Angels
Handmade Angels.description: A group of delicate handcrafted figurines
Handmade Angels.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the exquisite craftsmanship of these heavenly figures. Each one is unique, their hand painted faces reflecting the artisan's attention to detail.

Christmas Decorations.name: Christmas Decorations
Christmas Decorations.description: An array of festive décor packed away for next Christmas
Christmas Decorations.examine_text: These decorations vary from glittering ornaments to large, intricately designed nativity scenes. Stored carefully to avoid any damages.

Candles.name: Candles
Candles.description: Numerous candles of various sizes stocked for use
Candles.examine_text: You see an assortment of candles, from the small votives to larger pillar types. Some are scented giving off a warm, pleasant aroma.

Donations.name: Donations
Donations.description: A pile of donated items to the church
Donations.examine_text: Upon inspection, you see a variety of goods- clothing, food, books, and more- all donated by the congregation for the needy.

Small Round Window.name: Small Round Window
Small Round Window.description: A small round window, devoid of glass
Small Round Window.examine_text: A small, round window cut out in the attic, intended for ventilation, not for viewing. It doesn't have any glass, allowing the outside air to circulate inside.

Sister Margaret.name: Sister Margaret
Sister Margaret.description: Sister Margaret is an elderly, hunched woman. She wears a simple, faded nun's habit, her hands are rough and wrinkled from years of labor, and she carries an old, flickering candle.
Sister Margaret.persona: I've been taking care of this church and everything in it for more than fifty years. The attic is my personal sanctuary; it's where I go to find peace and quiet.
Sister Margaret.goal: Her goal is to maintain the attic's organization and tidiness for future church needs.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A slightly used white wax candle, idle amidst the many others in the attic.
candle.examine_text: You notice that this wax candle is almost new, with just a tiny bit melted at the top. It smells slightly of honey and promises to burn for a good while.

key to the attic.name: Key to the Attic
key to the attic.description: A small but intricate key, usually used to access the attic.
key to the attic.examine_text: Looking at the key, you notice the intricate details carved into its handle. It's a bit old and rusted but still does its job perfectly. The church emblem is embedded in the handle design.

rosary beads.name: Rosary Beads
rosary beads.description: A beautiful string of rosary beads, kept in the attic as a sacred keepsake.
rosary beads.examine_text: The rosary beads have a delicate heirloom aura to them. The beads are made from an onyx-like substance that shines when hit by light. The crucifix at the end is bronze, worn from love and prayer.

Benjamin the Custodian.name: Benjamin the Custodian
Benjamin the Custodian.description: Benjamin is a tall, slow-moving man with a thick beard and a helpful demeanor. He's always seen carrying a toolkit ready to make any necessary repairs.
Benjamin the Custodian.persona: I've been looking after this old church since I was a young lad. Making sure that everything is in order and in its rightful place is my responsibility.
Benjamin the Custodian.goal: His goal is to keep the church structure secure and well-kept.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: A rugged old hammer with a sturdy wooden handle
Hammer.examine_text: This hammer has seen years of use. Though worn, it's still in good condition with a sturdy wooden handle and metal head. It clearly belongs to someone who takes tending to the church very seriously.

Nails.name: Nails
Nails.description: Rusty old nails stored in a small metal box
Nails.examine_text: These old nails, stored in a small metal box, are rusty and aged but still fit for purpose. The box is nearly full, meaning lots of potential repairs can be made.

Toolkit.name: Toolkit
Toolkit.description: A large toolbox filled with several different tools
Toolkit.examine_text: The large toolbox is filled with a variety of tools. Everything from screwdrivers and wrenches to pliers and tape measures. It's the perfect companion for someone responsible for maintaining the church.

Ghost of Father Francis.name: Ghost of Father Francis
Ghost of Father Francis.description: Father Francis is a ghostly apparition, clad in spectral vestments and glowing with a soft, ethereal light. His presence is accompanied by the faint smell of incense.
Ghost of Father Francis.persona: I continue to watch over my beloved church even in death. I mostly reside in the attic, a place I used to escape to in times of contemplation when I was alive.
Ghost of Father Francis.goal: His goal is to protect his church from evil spirits and guide its members with spiritual advice.

Spectral Bible.name: Spectral Bible
Spectral Bible.description: A ghostly bible that seems to flicker with ethereal light.
Spectral Bible.examine_text: Despite being spectral, the Bible seems well-preserved, as though time itself has been suspended for it. The holy book emanates a soothing, heavenly aura. The pages, though faint and ethereal, are full of scripture that holds profound wisdom and teachings.

Phantom Rosary.name: Phantom Rosary
Phantom Rosary.description: A rosary made of faint, ghostly beads that hovers in the air.
Phantom Rosary.examine_text: The Phantom Rosary, despite its intangible state, has a solid presence. Each bead seems to pulse with a soft, otherworldly glow. They are joined by a spectral cross, signifying the symbol of faith and devotion.

locations.name: Study Room
locations.description: A plain room with shelves of religious text are stored.  There are tables and chairs situated around the room available for use.  There are some trunks with books stored.
locations.background: Priests and scribes come here to gain knowledge and translate texts.  The day's sermons are also composed here by candle light.

Religious Text.name: Religious Text
Religious Text.description: A book with scuffed leather and gold gilt edging.
Religious Text.examine_text: The book contains religious text and depictions. Pages are old and yellow but still legible with beautiful caligraphic writing.

Wooden Chair.name: Wooden Chair
Wooden Chair.description: A simple chair made out of oak, heavily used with marks and scratches.
Wooden Chair.examine_text: Though the chair might not look comfortable, it's made that way to discourage prolonged idle sitting. The wood is polished and well cared for.

Old Trunk.name: Old Trunk
Old Trunk.description: A large wooden trunk with iron bindings, worn with age.
Old Trunk.examine_text: The trunk is heavy and filled with old manuscripts and parchments. The lock is rusted but functional.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.description: A brass candlestick holder, a little bit of wax dripped down
Candlestick.examine_text: It's made to hold one candle and has a handle. The wax is nearly finished.

Father James.name: Father James
Father James.description: Middle-aged with a thick beard and weathered face, Father James is often seen wearing his priest robes, glasses perched precariously on the edge of his nose.
Father James.persona: I am responsible for delivering the sermon every Sunday, so much of my time is spent studying the scriptures and translating ancient languages.
Father James.goal: To deliver a sermon that inspires and guides my church community.

Book of Scriptures.name: Book of Scriptures
Book of Scriptures.description: An old, worn-out book filled with teachings and scriptures.
Book of Scriptures.examine_text: The book is thick and heavy. Its pages are yellowed with age, and filled with eloquent text and illustrations on doctrine and scripture. Some of the page corners are dog-eared, showing frequent use.

Pen.name: Pen
Pen.examine_text: The pen is crafted from stained cherry wood, giving a vintage touch. Ink stains are present on the nib from constant use, and there are tiny scratches along its body.

Paper.name: Paper
Paper.description: Plenty of blank parchments stacked neatly together.
Paper.examine_text: Upon closer look, the parchment paper is of high quality, smooth and crisp. It's ready to endure the weight of profound thoughts and divine revelations.

Reading Glasses.name: Reading Glasses
Reading Glasses.description: A pair of worn-out reading glasses.
Reading Glasses.examine_text: The glasses has round lenses with slight scratches. The frame is thin and golden, fitting comfortably on the nose. It has been polished to a high shine despite showing signs of long use.

Scribe Simon.name: Scribe Simon
Scribe Simon.description: Simon is a young, thin man with an always serious expression. His hair is unkempt from hours of laborious work and his hands are stained with ink.
Scribe Simon.persona: I painstakingly translate every ancient text that comes our way. It's a tough job, but seeing the knowledge preserved is rewarding.
Scribe Simon.goal: To translate an ancient manuscript into our modern language.

ink_pot.name: Ink Pot
ink_pot.description: A small black clay pot filled with ink
ink_pot.examine_text: A small, round, black clay pot. Upon closer look, you can see it contains dark, color-rich ink. It still has a lot of ink left. The exterior of the pot is smooth, with a rougher texture inside where the ink has stained the clay.

quill.name: Quill
quill.description: A white feather quill, well-used and ink-stained
quill.examine_text: A leather-bound white feather quill. It is stained near the tip from years of being dipped in ink. The feather is a little frayed from use but still maintains its original beauty.

ancient_manuscript.name: Ancient Manuscript
ancient_manuscript.description: An ancient, fragile manuscript with unreadable texts
ancient_manuscript.examine_text: This ancient manuscript is covered with dust and has brittle yellowed pages. The text is written in a foreign script, it's meaning hidden to the untrained eye. The manuscript smells old and musty, yet somehow still possesses an aura of significance and wisdom.

Priestess Elizabeth.name: Priestess Elizabeth
Priestess Elizabeth.description: Elizabeth is a lady in her thirties with lovely auburn hair neatly tied back. She's always seen in her priestess robes, with freedom and kindness radiating from her azure eyes.
Priestess Elizabeth.persona: I assist in managing this church. My daily routine involves studying religious texts, and guiding those who seek help.
Priestess Elizabeth.goal: To provide guidance and spiritual support to those in need.

holy_book.name: The Holy Book
holy_book.description: A thick, bound book teeming with tales of faith, virtue, and salvation.
holy_book.examine_text: Upon a closer look, you see that the book has a worn, leather cover. Gold leaf adorns the edges and an embedded cross design shines in the middle. Every page is filled with neat handwriting in inky black. The pages smell of old parchment, stirring feelings of solemn reverence.

cross_pendant.name: Cross Pendant
cross_pendant.description: A small, gold cross pendant, a symbol of faith.
cross_pendant.examine_text: Upon closer observation, you see a beautifully crafted diminutive pendant, plated in gold, bearing the symbol of the cross. You can feel a peculiar sense of comfort and guidance eminating from the pendant. It's delicate, yet profoundly powerful.

Compassion.name: Compassion
Compassion.description: An unending fountain of kindness and understanding that springs from the heart.
Compassion.examine_text: This isn't tangible, but you can certainly feel it. It's the ability to empathize, to understand pain and to soothe it. It’s caring for others, reaching out, being there—a source of strength. It whispers of warm acceptance and selfless care.

locations.name: Chamber Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to the chamber is very ornate. It is filled with many religious symbols. There are candles and prayer books on  a table right next to the door. It is a wooden door. There is a sign near the front, which lists the name of people within the church. They can smell the scent of candles burning.
locations.background: People who need help come in and out of the door. It is where they enter the sanctuary to speak to the clergy. There is a sense of calmness that descends upon people as they enter the chamber. They go from the cold outside to the warmth of the chamber.

Wooden Door.name: Wooden Door
Wooden Door.description: A large wooden door that leads into the church.
Wooden Door.examine_text: The door is heavy, made of carved wood. You see many intricate designs and religious symbols etched into the wood.

Candles.name: Candles
Candles.description: A set of candles burning on a table.
Candles.examine_text: Each candle glows with a gentle light, filling the room with a divine aura. You can smell a faint scent of beeswax.

Prayer Books.name: Prayer Books
Prayer Books.description: A series of worn prayer books.
Prayer Books.examine_text: The books have soft, leather covers, worn over time. The pages are filled with various prayers and hymns, marked by numerous bookmarks.

Sign.name: Sign
Sign.description: A sign listing the names of the clergy.
Sign.examine_text: The sign is made of polished metal and is etched deeply with the names of the current clergy.

Father O'Brien.name: Father O'Brien
Father O'Brien.description: An elderly man, donned in a traditionalistic priest attire with small, wire-rimmed glasses perched on his nose. He has a soft, kind smile and eyes that hold a wealth of wisdom and compassion.
Father O'Brien.persona: I am Father O'Brien, a humble servant of the Lord, dedicating my life to guiding others through their spiritual journey. I provide comfort, support, and council to those who seek it.
Father O'Brien.goal: To provide spiritual guidance to all those who enter this church.

Cross Necklace.name: Cross Necklace
Cross Necklace.description: A simple but elegant cross necklace belonging to Father O'Brien
Cross Necklace.examine_text: Delicate gold chain with a small, beautifully crafted cross hanging down. The cross is simple, yet holds a profound meaning. It signifies Father O'Brien's unwavering faith, humility, and service to the Lord.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: An old, worn-out holy bible. Father O'Brien's most prized possession.
Holy Bible.examine_text: You can see the glory and history in this book. The deep brown leather cover is worn from years and years of use. Reverently handled, it contains the wisdom of ages and serves as Father O'Brien's guide and comfort in times of need.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A small prayer book Father O'Brien frequently uses during service.
Prayer Book.examine_text: On its cover is the crucifix, the symbol of sacrifice and redemption. Inside, it contains prayers for every occasion - joy, sorrow, hope, and healing. Father O'Brien considers this a tool in guiding his flock through their spiritual journey.

Sister Margaret.name: Sister Margaret
Sister Margaret.description: A petite woman, in her late fifties, dressed in a nun's black and white habit, her face radiates kindness while her hands are always busy with a rosary.
Sister Margaret.persona: I am Sister Margaret, I devote my life to prayer and service to those within our community. I offer kindness and solace to those who are in need of it.
Sister Margaret.goal: To pray for the wellbeing of our community and assist those in need, in any way I can.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of small beads, used to count prayers.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: The rosary beads are well-worn and smooth from frequent use. Each bead is carved in fine detail. They are a calming presence in Sister Margaret's hands.

Headpiece.name: Headpiece
Headpiece.description: A white headpiece, signifying Sister Margaret's devotion.
Headpiece.examine_text: The headpiece is clean, plain, and unassuming. A sign of humility and dedication. It is made with a soft, comfortable fabric, showing signs of frequent wear. Sister Margaret wears it with quiet dignity.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A small, worn prayer book containing a variety of prayers and hymns.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The pages of the prayer book are dog-eared, the dark ink faded on the creased pages. Sister Margaret's fingers trace over the familiar words with reverence. Many pages have notes and personal reflections scribbled in the margins, evidence of many hours of study and contemplation.

John Paul.name: John Paul
John Paul.description: A tall middle-aged man with dark hair, dressed impeccably in his Sunday best. His serious features light up with a welcoming smile as he greets visitors.
John Paul.persona: I am John Paul, a regular visitor and active member of this church. I believe in serving and contributing to my community through church activities.
John Paul.goal: To help make the church a welcoming and comforting place to all visitors.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A revered and much-used book of holy scriptures placed reverently on the table.
Holy Bible.examine_text: It's a thick, well-bound book filled with the holy scriptures, verse by verse, chapter by chapter. It seems well-used, but meticulously taken care of. It radiates a vibe of reverence and faith.

Signed visitor's book.name: Signed visitor's book
Signed visitor's book.description: A book where all the visitors register their names after they serve or visit the church.
Signed visitor's book.examine_text: This book seems to be filled with various names and remarks, some full of gratitude, some full of hope and wishes. You see your name, 'John Paul', signed several times across different dates.

Collection box.name: Collection box
Collection box.description: A box intended for the collection of ecclesiastical offerings to the church. It lies modestly at one side of the room.
Collection box.examine_text: It's a wooden box with a vertical slit on top to slide coins and notes through. It is sealed to ensure no theft. It is used for the collection of alms and donations to the church.

locations.name: The Main Chapel
locations.description: The church is a fairly simple one. Rows of pews lined up and facing a pulpit with podium and some stained glass on the walls. The building is made of old wood, but is sturdy and has stood for many decades.
locations.background: The church has been the focal point of this village for a long time. The bell tower has always been used to announce good or bad things happening to members of the community. Whenever it rings, the inhabitants of the village gather at the church to hear whatever news is to be delivered.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A worn-out, leather-bound bible laying on the pulpit.
Bible.examine_text: The book is old and well-used, pages frayed from years of fervent reading. The cover is deeply embossed with gold lettering spelling out 'Holy Bible.' Inside, the tiny text looks meticulously handprinted.

Church Pew.name: Church Pew
Church Pew.description: Rows of wooden Church Pews with worn out cushions.
Church Pew.examine_text: These hard wooden pews have seen better days. The stain is fading and the wood is chipping off in places. The cushions attached to them are threadbare and worn. They exude an unmistakable aura of history.

Stained Glass.name: Stained Glass
Stained Glass.description: Beautifully colored Sstained glass windows depicting different biblical scenes.
Stained Glass.examine_text: The large stained glass windows are depicting various biblical stories. Sunlight seeping through them creates a hauntingly beautiful array of colors. These truly are an artisan's masterpiece.

Father Benjamin.name: Father Benjamin
