Father Benjamin.description: An elderly man with silver hair gleaming under the soft light of the church. His eyes, though old and tired, still hold an unwavering determination.
Father Benjamin.persona: I have been the shepherd of this flock for so many years, always aiming to guide and comfort my congregation in their times of need.
Father Benjamin.goal: My goal is to lead a sermon that brings peace and unity to my congregation.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A medium-sized, black leather-bound book with the word 'Bible' on its cover in gold.
Bible.examine_text: This Bible seems to have seen years of constant use. The leather on the cover is worn in places, pages are marked with Father Benjamin's notes and there's a faint smell of incense. It seems to radiate a comforting aura.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A string of black beads with a small silver cross at the end.
Rosary.examine_text: Father Benjamin's rosary is a simple, unassuming object with weathered black beads and a small, slightly tarnished silver cross. It’s evident it was handled and prayed upon often.

Key to the Confessional Booth.name: Key to the Confessional Booth
Key to the Confessional Booth.description: An antique brass key with an intricate design.
Key to the Confessional Booth.examine_text: This is the key to the confessional booth. It's remarkably heavy for its size, with a simple, unadorned bow and a complex bit. It seems to be older than the church itself and is highly polished from years of use.

Sister Amelia.name: Sister Amelia
Sister Amelia.description: A middle-aged woman clothed in a starched nun's habit, her face is marked by soft age lines that enhance her gentle and calm persona.
Sister Amelia.persona: Daily, I offer my services and prayers to the Lord, believing that through Him, our small village will continue to prosper in peace.
Sister Amelia.goal: My aim is to complete my prayers for the day and to keep the church clean and welcoming for the attendees.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.examine_text: The prayer book is quite old and the pages are yellow with age. Notes and lines have been carefully written in the margins by Sister Amelia.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A tall, white candle stands here.
Candle.examine_text: The candle is nearly a foot tall and perfectly straight. It has a pleasant scent of beeswax.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A large, ornate crucifix hangs on the wall.
Crucifix.examine_text: The crucifix is made of polished wood and inlaid with gold. It has been painstakingly carved and is quite beautiful.

Jacob, the Bell Ringer.name: Jacob, the Bell Ringer
Jacob, the Bell Ringer.description: A tall young man with muscular build, his clothes a bit dusty due to constant interaction with the bell tower's ropes.
Jacob, the Bell Ringer.persona: The bell's resonant tone echoing across the village, that’s my doing, and a job which I perform dutifully and with humility.
Jacob, the Bell Ringer.goal: My duty is to ring the church bell on time to signify the beginning of the mass.

Bell Rope.name: Bell Rope
Bell Rope.description: A long, sturdy rope hanging from the ceiling.
Bell Rope.examine_text: On closer inspection, the rope seems worn with years of use, but still strong. Knotted at intervals for grip, this rope stretches up into the belfry, disappearing in the shadows above.

Dust Cloth.name: Dust Cloth
Dust Cloth.description: A ragged piece of fabric Jacob uses for dusting.
Dust Cloth.examine_text: Despite looking worn and frayed on the edges, the cloth has a certain charm. It's been stained with the dust of many years, hinting at its extended service in maintaining the cleanliness of the church.

locations.name: Pew
locations.description: The pew is worn from many years of being sat on during services.  It looks fairly basic upon first glance.  But there is something just under the surface, something moving.
locations.background: This pew is in the church that the King and his family used to attend.  They have all died under mysterious circumstances and are buried in the cemetery.  No one has come into this church since then and it's fallen into disrepair.  But just under the surface, if one were to look close enough, there is something going on, something brewing.

Hymn Book.name: Hymn Book
Hymn Book.description: An old hymn book, worn from years of use.
Hymn Book.examine_text: The hymn book is worn and dog-eared.  Some of the pages are torn and the hymns have faded over the years, but you can still make out 'Amazing Grace'.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: An ancient Bible, it looks like it hasn't been touched in years.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible is heavy with a leather cover.  The pages are gilded and the binding is still intact. Upon opening it, you find passages highlighted and notes written in the margins.

Church Pew.name: Church Pew
Church Pew.description: A large wooden church pew, worn from years of use.
Church Pew.examine_text: The pew is sturdy, made of oak and stained a dark brown. It is scratched and faded in places, as if many people have sat here over the years.

Father Joseph.name: Father Joseph
Father Joseph.description: Father Joseph is an elderly priest with a stooped posture and white hair. He has a gentle, kindly face and a perpetual twinkle in his blue eyes.
Father Joseph.persona: I have dedicated my life to serving the Lord and comforting His children in their time of need. There is no greater joy for me than bringing peace to a troubled soul.
Father Joseph.goal: To uncover the truth behind the mysterious deaths of the royal family.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A worn, leatherbound book teeming with wisdom and lore.
Holy Bible.examine_text: The bible is old and well-worn, its leather cover ingrained with the holy oils of many faithful hands over the years. The pages are creased and dog-eared from frequent use, filled with annotations in Father Joseph's careful handwriting.

Cross.name: Cross
Cross.description: A simple wooden cross adorning the sanctuary.
Cross.examine_text: The cross is large and austere, made from ancient, knotted wood. Despite its simple establishment, it emanates a powerful sense of peace and sanctity. The wood holds the dark stains of time yet it still maintains its strength.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: An old, silver rosary with carved wooden beads, bearing the marks of much use.
Rosary.examine_text: The rosary is a delicate chain of small, weathered wooden beads held together by silver links. The crucifix at the end is intricately fashioned, showing the minor details of Christ's suffering. It's clear that this is a tool much frequented by Father Joseph in his spiritual journey.

Ghost of the Queen.name: Ghost of the Queen
Ghost of the Queen.description: The ghost of the queen is a haunting visage garbed in tattered royal garments from the era she was alive. She moves silently and has an aura of melancholy around her.
Ghost of the Queen.persona: I am bound to this place due to my family's curse. I cannot rest until the mystery of our deaths is solved.
Ghost of the Queen.goal: To find an end to her afterlife suffering and enjoy eternal peace.

Ancient royal amulet.name: Ancient royal amulet
Ancient royal amulet.description: A worn out tin amulet, embedded with precious stones, resting on the cushion of the pew
Ancient royal amulet.examine_text: Intensely looking at the amulet, you see the ancient royal insignia engraved on it. Believed to possess arcane powers, it was once worn by the queen herself. Its aura seems to be still protecting the church.

Ghostly rose.name: Ghostly rose
Ghostly rose.description: A spectral white rose with a faint glow appears on the pew's seat.
Ghostly rose.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the rose turns ethereal and its petals gently sway, even without a hint of breeze. The aura of the rose matches that of the ghostly queen. Could it be a sign from the afterlife?

Tim the caretaker.name: Tim the caretaker
Tim the caretaker.description: Tim is a middle-aged man, understated in appearance with unkempt hair and a worn-out coat often covered in dust. He has perpetually furrowed brows and looks perpetually concerned.
Tim the caretaker.persona: All I ever wanted is to take care of this place. It's more than a job, it's a calling. But since the King's family tragedies, things have become a bit complicated.
Tim the caretaker.goal: To restore the church to its original state and dispel the eerie occurrences plaguing it.

Janitorial keys.name: Janitorial keys
Janitorial keys.description: A bunch of old, rusty keys on a large ring.
Janitorial keys.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the keys are for various areas of the church, including the belfry, the sacristy, and the crypt. Each key is labelled with an almost indiscernible etching.

Torn diary page.name: Torn diary page
Torn diary page.description: A weathered page torn from a diary, filled with hastily scrawled writing.
Torn diary page.examine_text: The page seems to be a part of Tim's diary log. It is filled with his fears and concerns about the strange occurrences in the church. Key phrases read: 'strange noises', 'shadows' and 'the King’s tomb'.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: An old-fashioned oil lantern that emits a soft glow.
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern is slightly rusted from years of use, with scratches on the surface suggesting many a night spent in the eerie confines of the deserted church. It feels surprisingly heavy in your hands, the faint smell of oil and burnt wick wafting up.

locations.name: Beside Church Pews
locations.description: The church pews fill the church as far as the eye can see. They are made of wood, harvested from ancient trees long ago. They gleam with the look of tender love and care, since they are polished after each ceremony.
locations.background: The church pews were built centuries ago by the first founders of GloopdeGloo. The founders wanted their followers to sit in something simple, but somewhat ornate. The pews are not comfortable by any means, but they are nice to look at. Numerous butts fill the pews every Sunday for the weekly ceremony.

Ancient Pew.name: Ancient Pew
Ancient Pew.description: A long wooden pew with a polished surface.
Ancient Pew.examine_text: This ancient pew has intricate carvings on its surface, signifying the stories of early inhabitants and their faith. Despite its age, it's solid and sturdy. A testament to the craftsmanship of its makers.

Ceremonial-candle.name: Ceremonial-candle
Ceremonial-candle.description: A long, wax candle set on a shiny brass holder.
Ceremonial-candle.examine_text: The pale white wax of the candle gleams against the dim light. It exudes a soft, delicate aroma when lit. The brass holder, polished to perfection, reflects the flickering flame elegantly.

Hymn-book.name: Hymn-book
Hymn-book.description: A worn out hymn book filled with numerous spiritual songs.
Hymn-book.examine_text: The hymn book, though worn with age, is bound in leather and engraved with golden letters. The pages inside are off-white and have a musty scent. The hymns are beautifully written, with lyrics singing praises of the divine.

Father John.name: Father John
Father John.description: A middle aged man in long, flowing priestly attire. His hair is thinning and grey, and his eyes carry a twinkle of wisdom.
Father John.persona: I am a dedicated servant of the Lord, leading my flock and walking in His path. I offer guidance, peace, and spiritual wisdom to anyone in need.
Father John.goal: My task is to share God's redeeming message and ensure that all who visit our church leave with a sense of peace and newfound wisdom.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick, well-used old book, with pages yellowed from age and use.
Bible.examine_text: This is a Holy Bible, worn from many years of use, with passages highlighted and margins filled with Father John's notes. It is the source of his spiritual wisdom and guidance, and he uses it every day in his sermons and teachings.

Rosary Beads.name: Rosary Beads
Rosary Beads.description: A string of elegant beads, with a crucifix pendant attached at one end.
Rosary Beads.examine_text: This is a string of rosary beads. Each bead represents a specific prayer in the Catholic tradition. Father John uses this tool daily for prayer and contemplation, and it keeps him connected to his faith.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A ornate crucifix, made of gleaming silver metal.
Crucifix.examine_text: This is a crucifix, symbolizing the sacrifice and resurrection of Jesus Christ. It serves as a reminder to Father John of his spiritual mission and his commitment to his faith.

Sister Agnes.name: Sister Agnes
Sister Agnes.description: A short, elderly nun with wire-rimmed spectacles. She's often seen with a cross hanging at her waist and clutching a rosary in her hands.
Sister Agnes.persona: I've spent my life devoted to prayer and service. I believe in the power of prayer and God's unwavering love.
Sister Agnes.goal: I want to serve the Lord with all my heart and help others in their spiritual journey.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.examine_text: A beautiful rosary made of wooden beads, each bead is meticulously crafted. The crucifix at the end is intricate and delicately designed. This has been a companion of Sister Agnes in all her prayers.

Book of Psalms.name: Book of Psalms
Book of Psalms.examine_text: The book has a leather cover and its pages are worn out from use. Sister Agnes has read and prayed every single psalm in this book. She finds divine comfort and wisdom from the verses found within. You can see notes and highlights on particular psalms.

spectacles.name: Spectacles
spectacles.examine_text: A simple pair of spectacles, the lenses slightly thick but clean. These spectacles have seen years of use, worn by Sister Agnes for her daily readings and other activities requiring keen vision.

Thomas.name: Thomas
Thomas.description: Thomas is young and often mistaken for a choir boy due to his cherubic face and slight frame. He is a custodian for the church.
Thomas.persona: As a custodian, I take pride in keeping our place of worship clean and pristine. It's a humble job, but I do it for the Lord.
Thomas.goal: My aim is to keep our church clean and welcoming, a place of solace for our congregation.

broom.name: broom
broom.examine_text: This is a standard broom made of straw and wood. It's seen some wear and tear but still functions well.

dustpan.name: dustpan
dustpan.description: A metal dustpan with a wooden handle
dustpan.examine_text: This dustpan shows evidence of many clean-ups. It has a slight dent which seems to give it character.

polish.name: polish
polish.description: An old tin can of wood polish
polish.examine_text: The can is a bit rusty, but the polish inside still seems good. It has a strong, lemony scent.

cleaning rags.name: cleaning rags
cleaning rags.description: A pile of discarded cloths used for cleaning
cleaning rags.examine_text: They are a little soiled but still good for a few more uses. Some are stained with polish and wax.

locations.name: Nave
locations.description: There are rows of long brown wooden seats, a grey stone floor and transparent glass window panes depicting religious iconography.  There are also copies of religious literature available.
locations.background: A fairly plain area, this is where the congregation meets.  They come here to listen to religious sermons, sing, and enjoy worship.

Wooden Pew.name: Wooden Pew
Wooden Pew.description: A long wooden bench, worn and smooth from years of use.
Wooden Pew.examine_text: This pew is made of a dark, rich-coloured wood with an aged, glossy finish. Surprisingly, despite seeming old, it’s quite sturdy.

Stained Glass Window.name: Stained Glass Window
Stained Glass Window.description: A large, ornate window, painted with colourful depictions of religious events.
Stained Glass Window.examine_text: The stained glass window is a canvas of bright and colourful images, telling stories entrenched in religious lore. Sunlight filters through, casting vibrant hues onto the stone floor.

Religious Book.name: Religious Book
Religious Book.description: A thick, well-preserved book filled with centuries of wisdom and stories.
Religious Book.examine_text: The book is bound in burgundy leather with corners tinged with gold. Inside, the pages are slightly yellowed with age, filled with closely-written text and beautiful, intricate illustrations.

Pastor John.name: Pastor John
Pastor John.description: A middle-aged man, balding with grey hair at his temples, dressed in black clergy robes with a sincere, calm expression.
Pastor John.persona: I'm Pastor John, dedicated to service and faith. I lead a selfless life, always eager to help others in their spiritual journey.
Pastor John.goal: To provide spiritual guidance to my congregation and help them in their spiritual growth.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A thick, worn book with fine print and thin pages.
Holy Bible.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the pages are filled with ancient scriptures, the teachings of Christianity. The book has been well used.

Holy Cross.name: Holy Cross
Holy Cross.description: A small, golden cross, about the size of your palm.
Holy Cross.examine_text: The cross is beautifully crafted, simple, yet profound in its representation. Engraved on the back is a scripture, 'John 3:16'.

Clerical Cassock.name: Clerical Cassock
Clerical Cassock.description: A long, black robe that falls to the ankles.
Clerical Cassock.examine_text: This Cassock seems to be in pristine condition, you can see the dedication in the exquisite stitchwork. The fabric feels thick and comfortable. It is an embodiment of Pastor John's dedication to his service.

Old Lady Margaret.name: Old Lady Margaret
Old Lady Margaret.description: A frail elderly woman with white hair, dressed in a conservative dark dress, clutching a rosary, lost deep in prayer.
Old Lady Margaret.persona: I am Lady Margaret, a regular at this church. Prayer is my solace and I seek peace through it every day.
Old Lady Margaret.goal: To offer prayers for my family and everyone around me.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A string of prayer beads often used in religious practices.
Rosary.examine_text: The rosary is made of tiny, round, polished wooden beads. Each bead is linked together with a silver chain. At the end of the string is a small wooden cross.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: An old, worn leather-bound book filled with prayers.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The prayer book is heavy and filled with pages yellowed with age. The pages are filled with handwritten prayers and heartfelt annotations of a bygone era. The binding is slightly worn, showing frequent use.

Shawl.name: Shawl
Shawl.description: A large, woven shawl generally used for warmth or modesty.
Shawl.examine_text: The shawl is a rich plum color with a subtle, intricate pattern woven into the fabric. It feels soft and warm, providing comfort and modesty during prayer or cool weather.

Young Thomas.name: Young Thomas
Young Thomas.description: A teenage boy with glasses, dressed in casual jeans and shirt, looks around curiously, unsure of where to sit.
Young Thomas.persona: I’m Thomas, I was forced to come here with my parents. This isn’t my usual scene, but the structure of the church is somewhat intriguing.
Young Thomas.goal: To get through the service without getting bored and maybe sketch some of the stunning architecture.

Backpack.name: Backpack
Backpack.description: A blue and black, worn-out knapsack. It seems like it's been to many places.
Backpack.examine_text: On a closer look, the backpack is adorned with a number of patches and stickers. It's clear this bag has seen a lot. There are many pockets, each possibly hiding something interesting inside.

Sketchbook.name: Sketchbook
Sketchbook.description: A thick, leather-bound sketchbook filled with blank white pages.
Sketchbook.examine_text: Upon further inspection, a few pages of the sketchbook have been filled with sketches of various architectural structures with great detail. It's clear that the owner has a keen eye for structures.

Pencil.name: Pencil
Pencil.examine_text: Closer inspection reveals the slight imperfections in the wood, the dents and marks that tell a story of constant use. This is a tool of creation, held by an unseen hand.

locations.name: Nave
locations.description: The nave of the church is a simple but ethereal looking room that is big enough to hold a couple hundred people. There are simple wooden benches, ten feet long, arranged in rows through the room, with one aisle down the center. The benches face the pulpit. Along the side walls of the room there are beautiful stained glass windows depicting Biblical imagery.
locations.background: The church is the oldest church in the region. It was built centuries ago by Christian missionaries, and it has hosted many weddings, blessings, funerals and holidays of the local populations and their ancestors.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: A simple wooden bench, worn by the passage of countless worshipers.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench is sturdy and simply designed, devoid of any lavish designs. The wood is worn smooth from decades of use and the passage of countless worshipers. There's room enough on it for up to four people.

Stained Glass Window.name: Stained Glass Window
Stained Glass Window.description: A beautiful stained glass window depicting Biblical imagery.
Stained Glass Window.examine_text: The window is a colorful mosaic of stained glass, each piece intricately designed and fitted together to depict stories from the Bible. The light filtering through paints a kaleidoscope of colors onto the stone floor of the nave.

Pulpit.name: Pulpit
Pulpit.description: A sturdy, wooden pulpit situated at the front of the nave.
Pulpit.examine_text: Made of the same sturdy wood as the benches, the pulpit stands raised above the nave floor. It is used by the priest for delivering sermons. Despite its simple design, it exudes a sense of authority and it is the focus of the congregation during masses.

Father Thomas.name: Father Thomas
Father Thomas.description: A man in his late 60s, Father Thomas is clad in traditional priest attire with a white collar. His face carries signs of age but his eyes still gleam with the passion for service and spirituality.
Father Thomas.persona: I have been a servant of God in this church for the majority of my life. I see myself not just as a religious leader, but a shepherd for my congregation. I am always here to provide guidance, comfort, and sacraments to those who seek them.
Father Thomas.goal: I'm trying to prepare the church for the Easter service.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A thick, leather-bound Bible with slightly worn corners.
Bible.examine_text: The Bible feels weighty in the hands, filled with the wisdom and teachings over centuries. Touching its embossed cover and thin pages evokes a silent and powerful reverence. Father Thomas has bookmarked many passages that he revisits during his sermons.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A simple but beautifully crafted rosary made from wood and metal.
Rosary.examine_text: The Rosary, a symbol of faith for Father Thomas, is made of small wooden beads strung together with a silver cross hanging at its end. Each bead holds significance, acting as a reminder of the prayers he gives for his congregation.

Pocket Watch.name: Pocket Watch
Pocket Watch.description: An old but shining pocket watch.
Pocket Watch.examine_text: Given to him on his ordination day, Father Thomas always carries this pocket watch. The timepiece, engraved with a biblical verse on the back, reminds him of his commitment to God and his followers. The hands of the clock, punctuated by the steady ticking, has kept time for countless sermons and silent prayers.

Mrs. Doris.name: Mrs. Doris
Mrs. Doris.description: An elderly woman with a heartwarming smile, Mrs. Doris is always seen in a worn-out but clean and tidy dress. Her frail hands continuously move over her rosary.
Mrs. Doris.persona: I've come to this church ever since I was a little girl. Now in my twilight years, I find great solace and strength in prayer. I always help with cleaning and managing the church, it's my way to serve God.
Mrs. Doris.goal: I need to tidy up the church before the evening Mass.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A simple but well loved rosary beads.
Rosary.examine_text: This rosary is comprised of small wooden beads strung together with a crucifix hanging down from the bottom. Each bead has been worn smooth from countless prayers. Yet despite the wear, it still carries a sense of reverence.

Cleaning supplies.name: Cleaning supplies
Cleaning supplies.description: A bucket full of cleaning supplies.
Cleaning supplies.examine_text: This is an old and sturdy bucket filled with cleaning supplies. Inside contains a soap, scrub brushes, rags, polish, and a feather duster. Everything one might need to keep a church clean and inviting is here.

Samuel.name: Samuel
Samuel.description: A bright-eyed young man in casual attire, Samuel is easily spotted with his notebook and pencil, always scribbling something down. He has a keen interest in the historical aspect of the church.
Samuel.persona: As a history major, I'm drawn to the rich history of this church. There is so much to learn from the inscriptions, the architecture - even the age-old stained glass windows hold stories!
Samuel.goal: I am researching and documenting the history and architectural details of this church.

Notebook.name: Notebook
Notebook.examine_text: A simple and charmingly worn leather-bound notebook. The name 'Samuel' is etched into the leather. There are plenty of blank pages left for jotting things down.

Pencil.name: Pencil
Pencil.examine_text: A standard, albeit slightly used, HB2 pencil. The wood is light colored, and the graphite is sharp. Perfect for sketching or taking notes.

Camera.name: Camera
Camera.examine_text: An advanced DSLR camera, perfect for a history major like Samuel. It has a sturdy black body and a high-end lens. Suitable for capturing minute details in the stained glass windows, or taking reference photos of the transcriptions.

locations.name: Along The Pews
locations.description: The alter faces west so the rising sun hits the cross just right each morning. The bejeweled cloth that lay over the alter sparkle and the room practically glows.
locations.background: People come far and wide to this church as it produces an almost magical atmosphere. People claim miracles have happened here because it is so beautiful.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: A worn, but meticulously kept bible.
Bible.examine_text: The cover is heavily worn, indicating years of usage. Pages are highlighted, underlined, and covered in notes from decades of study.

Prayer_Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer_Beads.description: A set of old, wooden prayer beads.
Prayer_Beads.examine_text: The beads are worn smooth from use, held together by a thin, leather string. Each bead represents a prayer or intention.

Pew.name: Pew
Pew.examine_text: The pew is sturdy, well polished and has seen more years of service than any one person.

Father Thomas.name: Father Thomas
Father Thomas.description: Father Thomas is an older man with wise, kind eyes and a robe that matches the alter's bejeweled cloth. He carries a well-worn bible at all times.
Father Thomas.persona: I have lived my life serving the Lord and guiding His people. My bible is my closest friend, and it has seen me through many a storm.
Father Thomas.goal: His lifelong aim is to inspire faith and hope in the hearts of his congregation.

Key to the Church.name: Key to the Church
Key to the Church.description: A rather ornate, heavy key explicitly made to unlock the church.
Key to the Church.examine_text: The key is cold to the touch, made from silver. It's well-worn, with elaborate designs etched into the stem and the head of the key, suggesting it's as old as the church itself.

Old Bible.name: Old Bible
Old Bible.description: A very old, heavy bible, that has been read hundreds of times.
Old Bible.examine_text: The cover of the bible is worn from use, with dog-eared pages and notes made in the margins through the years. There's a sensation of calmness as one holds it, reflecting the many wisdom-filled years it has guided

Cross Necklace.name: Cross Necklace
Cross Necklace.description: A simplistic cross necklace worn by Father Thomas.
Cross Necklace.examine_text: The cross is made from silver and hangs from a thin chain. It's simple but crafts a mighty testament to Father Thomas's faith.

Elder Elaine.name: Elder Elaine
Elder Elaine.description: She is a petite, elderly woman who always wears a delicate white lace shawl and a sweet, welcoming smile.
Elder Elaine.persona: I have been in this church longer than anyone else. Everything here has a story, and I can tell all.
Elder Elaine.goal: She seeks to keep the history and traditions of the church alive through storytelling.

Lace Shawl.name: Lace Shawl
Lace Shawl.description: An intricately knitted white shawl that Elder Elaine always has around her shoulders.
Lace Shawl.examine_text: The shawl is a masterpiece of delicate knitting. You can see that it's old, but very well cared for. It's soft, warm, and comforting, much like Elder Elaine herself.

Scripture Bookmarks.name: Scripture Bookmarks
Scripture Bookmarks.description: A set of colorful bookmarks with different scriptures written on them.
Scripture Bookmarks.examine_text: The bookmarks are thin strips of laminated paper, each one sporting a different vibrant design. Upon closer inspection, you can see that each one has a unique scripture verse written in Elder Elaine's beautiful handwriting.

Pack of Candies.name: Pack of Candies
Pack of Candies.description: A packet of hard candies that Elder Elaine often gives out to the children attending the church.
Pack of Candies.examine_text: The packet is simple and unassuming, but the candies inside are a treat. They're a variety of colors and Elder Elaine insists they're all naturally flavored. You remember them being a special treat when you were younger.

Young Daniel.name: Young Daniel
Young Daniel.description: Daniel is a young lad with vibrant red hair and big curious eyes, always seen carrying a small notebook and a pen.
Young Daniel.persona: I come to this church every day, always drawn by its beauty and the stories of the miracles. I jot them down in my notebook; hopefully, I'll write a book about it one day.
Young Daniel.goal: His objective is to document and share the church's miracle stories with the world.

Notebook.name: Notebook
Notebook.description: A simple notebook with a rugged leather cover that Young Daniel always carries.
Notebook.examine_text: The pages of the notebook are filled with scribbles, doodles and notes. It contains stories of the miracles that have been witnessed in this church, intermingled with Young Daniel's thoughts and impressions.

Pen.name: Pen
Pen.description: An old fountain pen, seemingly at odds with the modern world around it.
Pen.examine_text: Despite its age and the advancing technology, this inkwell pen lives on, faithfully serving its purpose. The nib is slightly bent from use, but it still works perfectly.

Polaroid Photo of the Church.name: Polaroid Photo of the Church
Polaroid Photo of the Church.description: An old polaroid picture of the church, gently yellowing with age.
Polaroid Photo of the Church.examine_text: The photo captures the majesty and serenity of the church perfectly. The way the light hits the cross, the glow that seems to permeate the church... it's all there.

locations.name: The Dogs' Domain
locations.description: there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
locations.background: legend has it that the animals that live here are self sustaining and never eat food given to them by humans. they have an informal community set up.

Old Bible.name: Old Bible
Old Bible.description: A worn and dusty Bible left on a pew
Old Bible.examine_text: It's an old, weathered copy of the Bible. The pages have yellowed with age and the cover is torn in places. Some of the pages are dog-eared, possibly marking important passages.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A half-melted candle stands on the altar
Candle.examine_text: A white wax candle, halfway melted with a thin wick sticking up. It has been a long time since this candle was last lit.

Pew.name: Pew
Pew.examine_text: It's a classic church pew, made from old, creaky wood and polished to a dull sheen. There are numerous scratches and carvings in the wood, possibly etched by bored church-goers.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A large ornate crucifix hangs on the wall
Crucifix.examine_text: It's a large, intricately detailed crucifix hanging high on the wall. Made of dark wood and adorned with gold accents, it stands as a symbol of faith.

Stained Glass Window.name: Stained Glass Window
Stained Glass Window.description: A beautiful stained glass window depicting various biblical scenes
Stained Glass Window.examine_text: The window is a kaleidoscope of vibrant colors, depicting various scenes from the Bible. The light streaming through the glass casts a colorful glow in the church.

Confession Booth.name: Confession Booth
Confession Booth.description: A dark wooden confession booth sits in the corner
Confession Booth.examine_text: It's a small, secluded booth situated in the corner of the church. Separated by a thin wooden wall, it offers a sense of privacy and solace for those seeking confession.

Rover, The Alpha Dog.name: Rover, The Alpha Dog
Rover, The Alpha Dog.description: Rover is a huge, muscular German Shepherd with bright, alert eyes and a coat that shines in the dim light.
Rover, The Alpha Dog.persona: I'm Rover, the leader of the pack. I'm always on my guard, ensuring the safety of my friends and the sanctity of our domain.
Rover, The Alpha Dog.goal: Trying to keep the pack safe and protect our home from human interference.

Old Chew Toy.name: Old Chew Toy
Old Chew Toy.description: An old, worn-out chew toy of Rover.
Old Chew Toy.examine_text: The toy bears multiple signs of wear, it's torn in places and the squeaker no longer works. It has been masticated a thousand times, a testament to its owner's prowess.

Shiny Silver Dog Tag.name: Shiny Silver Dog Tag
Shiny Silver Dog Tag.description: Rover's shiny silver dog tag, reflecting authority and respect.
Shiny Silver Dog Tag.examine_text: The sturdy metal tag is etched with the name 'Rover', presumably signifying the leader of the canine pack. It sparkles even in dim light, suggesting it's importance to its wearer.

Whiskers, The Wise Cat.name: Whiskers, The Wise Cat
Whiskers, The Wise Cat.description: Whiskers is a stout, old tabby cat with one blind eye, sitting solemnly at a distance, eyeing the dogs play.
Whiskers, The Wise Cat.persona: I'm Whiskers, the wisest among all animals in this domain. They think I'm grumpy, but I really just prefer observing rather than engaging.
Whiskers, The Wise Cat.goal: Trying to pass on my wisdom to others and live out my retirement in peace.

Tarnished Mouse Toy.name: Tarnished Mouse Toy
Tarnished Mouse Toy.description: An old, worn-out toy mouse with a little bell still clinging to its tail.
Tarnished Mouse Toy.examine_text: This once vibrant toy mouse has seen better days, beaten and battered from countless plays and swipes. The fur is faded and knotted, eyes long gone, and the tail has only a single, rusty bell which no longer jingles when shaken.

Ball of Yarn.name: Ball of Yarn
Ball of Yarn.description: A small, dusty ball of dark-colored yarn.
Ball of Yarn.examine_text: Unraveling the loosely wound threads would reveal a multitude of tangled knots. Bits of pet hair and dust cling to the yarn, and it exudes a unique scent of old timber and musk, a testament to its time spent in this domain.

Chirpy, The Fearless Squirrel.name: Chirpy, The Fearless Squirrel
Chirpy, The Fearless Squirrel.description: Chirpy is a tiny, agile squirrel with a twitchy nose and sharp, curious eyes, always busy scampering around.
Chirpy, The Fearless Squirrel.persona: I'm Chirpy, and I love having fun all the time. I just can't sit still, there's always something to explore!
Chirpy, The Fearless Squirrel.goal: Trying to explore every nook and cranny of the domain and have fun at the same time.

Pile of acorns.name: Pile of Acorns
Pile of acorns.description: A scattered mound of acorns, evidence of a small creature's stock.
Pile of acorns.examine_text: Upon closer observation, you notice the fine lines of the acorns; they are seemingly untouched and full. A feast for a rodent.

tiny scarf made of leaves.name: Tiny Scarf Made of Leaves
tiny scarf made of leaves.description: A delicate scarf, sewn together with leaves. It looks custom-made for a small woodland creature.
tiny scarf made of leaves.examine_text: Despite its crude design, the scarf holds a certain charm. The leaves are all from the same tree, carefully chosen and arranged by size and texture.

locations.name: Bell Tower
locations.description: The Bell Tower is steep and rises high above the building. The stairs are made of rickety wood and go up thirty stories. The bell is so old that the cracks seem almost perfectly set in the iron.
locations.background: The bell is rung daily at high noon. It also tolls when someone has died or married

Bell.name: Bell
Bell.description: An antique, iron bell hung high in the tower.
Bell.examine_text: The bell is a giant artifact of ancient ironwork. Thick cracks etch deep into its massive form and a wooden mallet swings idly by its side. The underside is dark and hollow, an abyss that swallows up the thin light.

Altar.name: Altar
Altar.description: A small wooden altar at the base of the bell tower.
Altar.examine_text: The altar, though diminutive, bears the ornate tracery and gilt-work of genuine dedication. A still reverence lingers near the worn surface, which feels velvety under your touch.

Climbing Ropes.name: Climbing Ropes
Climbing Ropes.description: A set of thick, coarse ropes attached to the bell.
Climbing Ropes.examine_text: These ropes are wearied from years of constant pull and release. Their fibers are thick and browned with age, though sturdy enough to withstand further use.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A slightly worn book of prayers.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The book is old and well-thumbed, with a cover that has faded to a deep navy. Inside, the pages are filled with ancient prayers and blessings.

Brother Elijah.name: Brother Elijah
Brother Elijah.description: Dressed in a worn habit, Brother Elijah is an aging monk with a wiry physique, bright, grey eyes and a wispy beard.
Brother Elijah.persona: I've been a monk in this church for almost forty years now. The bell tower is my place of serenity where the voice of God calls louder than anywhere else.
Brother Elijah.goal: To ensure the sacred bell keeps tolling, symbolic of the Church's eternal agility and persistence.

Robe.name: Robe
Robe.examine_text: The robe is made of coarse, brown fabric, much repaired but clean. It hangs loosely, revealing nothing of the figure beneath. A large hood can be thrown over the head for privacy during prayer.

Bell rope.name: Bell rope
Bell rope.description: A sturdy, well-worn rope for pulling the bell.
Bell rope.examine_text: The rope is thick and strong, designed to withstand countless pulls. It's woven of heavy hemp, with a worn wooden handle at the end to assist with ringing the massive bell overhead.

Scrolls.name: Scrolls
Scrolls.description: A set of worn but cherished Biblical scrolls.
Scrolls.examine_text: The scrolls are made from fragile parchment, inked in fine calligraphy. The words from Proverbs, Psalms, and the Gospels, among others, are beautifully written on them.

Monk's staff.name: Monk's staff
Monk's staff.description: A plain wooden staff, worn smooth over time.
Monk's staff.examine_text: The staff is as tall as a man and made of sturdy oak. It's used more for walking than for defense, but its heft and solidity could make it a surprisingly effective weapon in a pinch.

Little Timmy.name: Little Timmy
Little Timmy.description: Little Timmy is an orphan whose sparkling blue eyes are full of mischief. He is skinny, with dirt streaking his face and clothes, and tousled brown hair.
Little Timmy.persona: I loves to play in this tower, it's like a giant toy for me! And the view from up here is better than any other in all of the town!
Little Timmy.goal: Learn the bell tolls and get a new family.

Slingshot.name: Slingshot
Slingshot.description: An old, well-used slingshot. The rubber is slightly worn out.
Slingshot.examine_text: Upon a closer look, you can see that the y-frame has been carefully whittled from a bit of yew, while the rubber elastic looks worn from plenty of use. The handle seems to be slightly weathered due to age. There is a name carved neatly into the handle - 'Timmy'.

Small bag of marbles.name: Small bag of marbles
Small bag of marbles.description: A small drawstring bag filled with glass marbles.
Small bag of marbles.examine_text: Inside the drawstring bag, you find a collection of small, brightly colored glass marbles. They are all different colors, and they shine brightly under the light. Each one is smooth and cool to the touch.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.examine_text: The apple is perfectly ripe, with a vibrant red color and a slight sheen on its skin. It looks deliciously tempting and feels firm in your hands.

Father Augustine.name: Father Augustine
Father Augustine.description: Father Augustine is a middle-aged priest with a comforting presence. He's tall, somewhat portly with a kind, round face and twinkling eyes behind a pair of spectacles.
Father Augustine.persona: I am Father Augustine, one of the shepherds of this church. I guide my flock and serve the Lord the best way I know.
Father Augustine.goal: To welcome and guide more souls to the way of Lord.

Bible.name: Bible
Bible.description: An old, well-worn Holy Bible belonging to Father Augustine.
Bible.examine_text: On closer inspection, the Bible is full of paper distractions and scribbled notes in margins. Some pages seem more worn than others, their edges curled from frequent handling. There is a comforting smell of old paper and worn leather.

Rosary.name: Rosary
Rosary.description: A precious rosary made from ebony and silver, used frequently by Father Augustine.
Rosary.examine_text: Upon a closer look, the rosary beads are smooth from years of use, each decade etched deeply into the ebony. The cross hangs heavy, its silver gleaming despite the years.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A simple, yet tall wax candle.
Candle.examine_text: Examining it more closely you can see the uneven surface caused by the melted wax. The wick seems barely used, suggesting it was lit recently. The glow of the flame dances, casting warm light and shedding off a light scent of beeswax.

locations.name: Front Row
locations.description: The hard bench is facing the most beautiful alter human eyes have ever seen. Gold drapes the walls behind where the preacher stands. A large dark oak and gold bench in front of where they would stand. A large piano off to the side.
locations.background: This church has been around since early man and still has a large weekly following that gives all they can to keep the church in tip top shape.

Hard Bench.name: Hard Bench
Hard Bench.description: A long, dark oak bench for the faithful to sit.
Hard Bench.examine_text: Crafted from dark oak, the bench is long and has definitely seen better days. But its history and the countless prayers whispered from its seating adds to its palpable spiritual aura.

Golden Altar.name: Golden Altar
Golden Altar.description: A stunning golden altar that serves as the centerpiece of the church.
Golden Altar.examine_text: A breathtaking work of art, the altar glistens with its gold embellishments. Angelic figures can be seen carved on its surface, each seemingly telling a story of faith and redemption.

Church Piano.name: Church Piano
Church Piano.description: This antique piano rests off to the side, ready for hymns to be played.
Church Piano.examine_text: A classic upright piano that echoes with the melody of faith. Its worn keys hint at the many hymns played throughout the years, each note a testament to devotion.

Elderly Mrs. Sullivan.name: Elderly Mrs. Sullivan
Elderly Mrs. Sullivan.description: Frail, old woman with wispy white hair, wearing a meticulous Sunday dress, with a rosary clutched tightly in her thin hands.
Elderly Mrs. Sullivan.persona: I've been coming to this church ever since I was a little girl. It's been my sanctuary through ups and downs, and each mass brings me closer to the Lord.
Elderly Mrs. Sullivan.goal: Seek solace and hope through prayer and communion.

rosary.name: rosary
rosary.description: A delicate rosary with small, pearl beads and a silver cross.
rosary.examine_text: This old yet incredibly cared for rosary carries a rich and lustrous patina on its silver cross. The small pearl beads slide through your fingers, and each feels like a silent prayer. A tiny, worn picture of Mrs. Sullivan as a little girl is wedged behind the cross.

bible.name: bible
bible.examine_text: The bible seems to have been passed down for generations. It's worn and the pages are yellowing, but it still contains the spiritual nourishment Mrs. Sullivan masses rely on. It's opened to Psalms, with beloved verses highlighted.

reading glasses.name: reading glasses
reading glasses.description: A pair of old-fashioned reading glasses.
reading glasses.examine_text: The reading glasses have large, circular lenses and a chain to rest on Mrs. Sullivan's chest when not in use. They seem ancient but are extremely well-cared for. Through them, countless sermons and biblical passages have been read.

family photo.name: family photo
family photo.description: A black and white family photograph.
family photo.examine_text: The photo shows a young Mrs. Sullivan surrounded by her parents and siblings, all dressed in their Sunday best. Despite the wear and tear, love and happiness radiate from the picture. It's a reminder of the family history tied to this church.

Jolly Mr. Simmons.name: Jolly Mr. Simmons
Jolly Mr. Simmons.description: A jolly, rotund man in his late forties, with a warm and infectious smile. Dresses impeccably in his signature plaid suit.
Jolly Mr. Simmons.persona: My week doesn't truly begin until I've played my favorite hymns on that grand piano over there. Music, to me, is a prayer that needs no words.
Jolly Mr. Simmons.goal: Spread joy and serenity through his church music.

piano_sheet_music.name: Piano Sheet Music
piano_sheet_music.description: A bundle of weathered paper bound together, with musical notes dancing over their surface.
piano_sheet_music.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the intricate notes and symbols on the musical stave, forming several beautiful hymns that have been cherished over generations. Annotations and corrections are visible in the margins, evidence of the passion and dedication Jolly Mr. Simmons has for his music.

organist_gloves.name: Organist Gloves
organist_gloves.description: A pair of soft, well-worn white gloves, essential for any professional organist.
organist_gloves.examine_text: Examining the gloves closely, you see the faintish hint of wear on the fingertips, where countless hours of play have brushed the ivory keys, translating written melody into resonance and worship. The initials 'J.M.S.' are delicately monogrammed onto the cuff of each glove.

small_harmonica.name: Small Harmonica
small_harmonica.description: A pocket-sized, metal musical instrument, exuding a charming nostalgia.
small_harmonica.examine_text: Looking closer at the harmonica, you notice the shine of the well-polished surface, reflecting the church's ambient light. A hint of wear indicates constant use. It's small, perfect for pocket transport and impromptu solos by Jolly Mr. Simmons during service.

Curious Little Emily.name: Curious Little Emily
Curious Little Emily.description: An innocent looking young girl, with bright eyes full of curiosity. Dressed in a faded, hand-me-down dress, clutching a beat-up, well-loved doll.
Curious Little Emily.persona: Every Sunday, I sit right here with my dolly, and listen to the stories from the big book. I can't read yet, but I like the bright pictures and momma tells me, the preacher man is telling stories about a really nice man named Jesus.
Curious Little Emily.goal: Understand the church sermons and become as good as the 'nice man named Jesus'.

worn-out doll.name: Worn-out Doll
worn-out doll.description: A well-loved and tattered toy doll
worn-out doll.examine_text: You see a worn-out doll that has seen better days. The doll appears to have been well-loved, with its threadbare dress and missing eye. Despite its tired appearance, you can see why Emily would love it - it simply looks like the perfect companion for a child.

colorful hair-bows.name: Colorful Hair-bows
colorful hair-bows.examine_text: A collection of colorful hair-bows, in various shades of red, blue, yellow, pink and purple. The satin ribbons hold intricate bows; some even have little beads or buttons sewn onto them. They'd add a fun and child-like element to any hairstyle.

bag of marbles.name: Bag of Marbles
bag of marbles.description: A small pouch filled with colorful marbles
bag of marbles.examine_text: It's a small bag filled to the brim with marbles of all colors - red, blue, green, yellow, even some clear ones with wisps of color spiraling through. They're deeply colored glass, and light dances off them in an enticing way. Almost makes you want to have a marble race.

locations.name: Confessional Room
locations.description: The confessional room is small and cramped, offering access to only a single person at a time.  Once inside this small, wooden room, A person is alone with nothing but the cardinal and their own sins.  The confessional room has a single wooden bench and small table holding a candle, with a sliding window that allows words to pass through to the other side.  The cardinal waits on the other side, ready to absolve someone of their sins.
locations.background: The confessional room is one of the oldest rooms in the church.  Pilgrims come from far away to unload their sins and seek forgiveness from the cardinal.  Tucked away in a small corner of church, the confessional room is modest and secluded.  Although the demand is great, the confessional room is always ready for those who have need of it.

Wooden Bench.name: Wooden Bench
Wooden Bench.description: A small, uncomfortable wooden bench. It looks worn and polished by countless penitents over the years.
Wooden Bench.examine_text: The bench is made of a sturdy dark wood, probably oak, and it has a soft shine from countless sitting and kneeling prayers. It has no rest or cushioning - it was built for penance, not comfort.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A single slender candle, providing the sole source of light in the room.
Candle.examine_text: Made of white wax, the candle is almost completely consumed. To your surprise, the flame does not flicker, it maintains a steady, calm, almost divine light.

Sliding Window.name: Sliding Window
Sliding Window.description: A small wooden window within the confessional. It is shut, separating you from the cardinal on the other side.
Sliding Window.examine_text: It is a simple window: just a wooden rectangle that slides to the side. The mystery of its opposite side calls to you in the dim candle light.

Cardinal Dominic.name: Cardinal Dominic
Cardinal Dominic.description: Cardinal Dominic, an elderly man with snow-white hair and a kind face is draped in red cardinal's robes. His glasses rest towards the end of his nose as he listens attentively.
Cardinal Dominic.persona: I am Cardinal Dominic, a devoted servant of God. I have been guiding the lost and seeking redemption for the sinners for several decades.
Cardinal Dominic.goal: My only aim is to provide spiritual guidance and forgiveness to those in need.

cross pendant.name: Cross Pendant
cross pendant.description: A small, silver cross hanging from a delicate chain.
cross pendant.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the cross pendant is simple but beautifully crafted. Engraved on its back is a prayer. This is the symbol of Cardinal Dominic's deep faith and devotion.

holy water.name: Holy Water
holy water.description: A small, glass vial containing clear, consecrated water.
holy water.examine_text: Looking at the vial, the holy water within sparkles even in this dim light. The water has been blessed by Cardinal Dominic himself and is believed to grant protection and spiritual purification.

bible.name: Bible
bible.description: A large, well-worn bible brimming with holy scriptures.
bible.examine_text: The Bible, aged by time and much use, has 'Cardinal Dominic' etched in golden letters on the cover. It is evident that this bible has served as his guide and companion for many years.

Emily.name: Emily
Emily.description: Emily is a middle-aged woman, anxious in her demeanor with her hands constantly twisting a piece of her scarf. Her tired eyes tell a story of yearning for forgiveness.
Emily.persona: I'm Emily, carrying the burden of my past mistakes, hoping to find solace and forgiveness within these sacred walls.
Emily.goal: Emily seeks absolution from the sins of her past.

rosary beads.name: Rosary Beads
rosary beads.description: A string of beads for prayer.
rosary beads.examine_text: The rosary beads are old yet carefully maintained, each bead worn smooth from countless prayers. The centerpiece features a figure of Mary and ends in a simple crucifix. It is clear that these beads have provided comfort and solace during hard times.

small locket.name: Small Locket
small locket.examine_text: The small locket is made of aged silver, etched with intricate designs hinting of a bygone era. It looks old, holding within it a tiny black and white photo of Emily's parents, signaling a painful regret she carried within herself. It's a reminder of her past mistakes that she wants to atone for.

Ghost of Father Lawrence.name: Ghost of Father Lawrence
Ghost of Father Lawrence.description: Visible only to a few, the ghost of the former priest, Father Lawrence, wanders the church. He is dapper dressed in an old-fashioned clerical suit, carrying a wooden cross.
Ghost of Father Lawrence.persona: I'm Father Lawrence, still tied to the church in death, making sure my beloved parishioners are taken care of.
Ghost of Father Lawrence.goal: The spirit of Father Lawrence seeks to assist and guide the living towards enlightenment.

old wooden cross.name: Old Wooden Cross
old wooden cross.description: An ancient wooden cross hangs forebodingly on the wall.
old wooden cross.examine_text: The Old Wooden Cross is a relic from times long past. It's darkened with age and the wood is cracked in places, yet it still emanates an aura of solace and peace. The figure of Christ is carved skillfully into the cross, his face showing peaceful acceptance.

locations.name: Confessional
locations.description: The red velvet curtains provide privacy and speak to the washing away of sins as the repentant person leaves the booth. The solid oaken bench provides no comfort, and hurries the churchgoer along in their confession. Behind the sheer screen is the waiting priest. Ornate designs are carved into the side of the confessional. Above it is a painting, dulled by age, but still depicting Jesus' death and resurrection with resounding clarity.
locations.background: The confessional is as ancient as Catholicism itself. Since the beginning of the Sacrament of Penance, this tiny, benched room has provided countless sinners with respite from their sin.

Velvet Curtains.name: Velvet Curtains
Velvet Curtains.description: Thick, red fabric used to shield the confessional booth
Velvet Curtains.examine_text: The curtains are deep scarlet in color, made from a plush material. They're noticeably worn by years of use but maintain a sense of regality.

Oaken Bench.name: Oaken Bench
Oaken Bench.description: A sturdy bench made from oak
Oaken Bench.examine_text: The bench is solid oak, without any cushion. Years of wear has seasoned the wood to a deep brown.

Screen.name: Screen
Screen.description: A thin, wooden partition dividing the booth
Screen.examine_text: The screen is sheer and intricately carved, providing privacy but not complete isolation.

Vintage Painting.name: Vintage Painting
Vintage Painting.description: An old painting depicting Jesus' death and resurrection
Vintage Painting.examine_text: Despite the fading colors and cracks, the painting still shows the agonizing crucifixion and miraculous resurrection of Jesus with great detail.

Father Donovan.name: Father Donovan
Father Donovan.description: A middle-aged man with kind eyes hidden behind thick rimmed glasses and greying hair. He dresses in traditional priestly vestments, a stark black cassock.
Father Donovan.persona: I've dedicated my life to the service of God and other people, a simple man tasked with the heavy burden of absolution. I carry this burden gladly, strengthened by my faith.
Father Donovan.goal: Help his congregation find absolution, peace and forgiveness.

bible.name: Bible
bible.description: A well-worn holy book bound in dark leather.
bible.examine_text: The pages, though creased and soft from frequent consultation, still hold a subtle yet potent aura. Hebrews 4:12 dominates a cracked and faded bookmark, reminding the reader that 'The word of God is living and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit.'

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A string of round, smooth beads in varying sizes, leading to a cross.
rosary.examine_text: Each bead on the rosary is polished to a comfortable smoothness, their years of use worn as a badge of dedication. The smaller beads alternate in decades with slightly larger ones leading to a worn, wooden cross. Though simple in design, their weight is a comforting presence, symbolizing a steadfast faith.

confessional_stole.name: Confessional Stole
confessional_stole.description: A long, purple fabric worn over the shoulders during confession.
confessional_stole.examine_text: A symbol of spiritual authority, humility, and service, it serves as Father Donovan's shield in battle against man's sin. The fabric is a deep purple, a color reserved for repentance and mourning, decorated with the subtle glimmer of a golden cross pattern.

Mrs. O'Donnell.name: Mrs. O'Donnell
Mrs. O'Donnell.description: An elderly woman, hunched over and burdened by age. Her hands, gnarled from arthritis, worry a rosary. Wearing modest and simple dresses, adorned with a soft shawl around her shoulders.
Mrs. O'Donnell.persona: I've seen many a sunset, each day filled with both joy and sorrow. My faith is my rock, the church my sanctuary. I try to make amends for the mistakes I've made.
Mrs. O'Donnell.goal: Seeking absolution for her sins and guidance for her remaining years.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A simple, yet intricately crafted rosary belonging to Mrs. O'Donnell.
rosary.examine_text: Beautiful wood and onyx beads strung together with a silver chain. A crucifix, worn smooth from years of prayer, dangles from the end. It's obvious that this rosary has been well-loved.

spectacles.name: Spectacles
spectacles.description: A pair of wire-framed glasses that Mrs. O'Donnell uses to read.
spectacles.examine_text: An old pair of glasses with thin wire frames. The lenses amplify Mrs. O'Donnell's eyes when she looks through them, a testament to her failing sight.

prayerbook.name: Prayer Book
prayerbook.description: A worn, leather-bound prayer book that Mrs. O'Donnell cherishes.
prayerbook.examine_text: This prayer book is well-worn from use. The edges are frayed, and the gilt lettering on the cover is faded, a testament to its age and the comfort it has provided. Inside, passages have been underlined and notes have filled the margins.

Mr. McGuire.name: Mr. McGuire
Mr. McGuire.description: Mr. McGuire is a tall, robust man in his 40s, with stubble lining his jaw and sadness etched in his eyes. Always in his work clothes as if he has come straight from the construction site.
Mr. McGuire.persona: Some days, the guilt weighs on me more than the concrete I pour. Some would say I'm a hard man, but I find solace in the church, seeking forgiveness for my past wrongdoing.
Mr. McGuire.goal: To find peace with his past and forgiveness for his transgressions.

Hard Hat.name: Hard Hat
Hard Hat.description: A worn-out hard hat with visible dents and scratches.
Hard Hat.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the hard hat seems to have lived a brutal lifespan. It's a dirty dull yellow with several dents and stains. The strap inside shows sign of repeated use. 'McGuire Construction' can be seen written on the side in fading black ink.

Work Gloves.name: Work Gloves
Work Gloves.description: A pair of thick leather gloves, worn with use.
Work Gloves.examine_text: The gloves are made of thick, coarse leather, built to withstand the rough life of handling heavy construction materials. They've definitely been used and bear the markings of cement, dirt and sweat. 'McGuire Construction' is embedded on the wrist section of the gloves.

Picture of Family.name: Family Photo
Picture of Family.description: An old but well-kept picture of a smiling family. It's been placed with care.
Picture of Family.examine_text: The photo is a bit worn around the edges but the happy faces of Mr. McGuire, a woman presumably his wife, and two young children are still clear. They're standing in front of a house with a wide and welcoming porch. The family members all have their arms around each other and they're smiling like they won the lottery.

locations.name: The Sacred Temple
locations.description: The Sacred Temple is where spiritual individuals go to worship the Gods.  It is massive in size compared to other buildings in the town.  A lot of ancient symbolical artwork covers the windows and a deep glow comes from the alter.
locations.background: The Sacred Temple has been around for more than the present local townsfolk can remember.  They also swear by it's powers on granting their wishes if worshiped correctly.

Ancient Artwork.name: Ancient Artwork
Ancient Artwork.description: Ancient, symbolical artwork covering the temple windows.
Ancient Artwork.examine_text: Intricately designed with vibrant colours, each piece of artwork tells a story of the gods. Some sections of the artwork have faded over time, adding to its charm and mystery.

Glowing Altar.name: Glowing Altar
Glowing Altar.description: A deep glow comes from the altar.
Glowing Altar.examine_text: Built of solid stone, the altar glows mysteriously. Offerings of flowers and incense adorn its surface, filling the air with a calming scent. It's believed to have divine energies attached to it.

Old Pews.name: Old Pews
Old Pews.description: Rows of old pews where the faithful can sit and pray.
Old Pews.examine_text: Made of heavy, dark wood, they are worn smooth from years of use. Each pew has an old hymnal book neatly placed on it.

Hymnal Book.name: Hymnal Book
Hymnal Book.description: An old book filled with hymns and prayers.
Hymnal Book.examine_text: The book is worn and well-loved, with dog-eared pages and hand-written notes in the margins. Some pages have been bookmarked with old, pressed flowers

Father Moris.name: Father Moris
Father Moris.description: A portly, kind-eyed priest with a bushy white beard. Wears the traditional brown and gold vestments of the church order.
Father Moris.persona: I dedicated my life to serving the Gods and the people of this town. I believe in the power of faith and the guidance it can provide in time of need.
Father Moris.goal: His main aim is to deliver a sermon that truly resonates with his congregation.

Well-Worn Prayer Book.name: Well-Worn Prayer Book
Well-Worn Prayer Book.description: An old, much-loved prayer book belonging to Father Moris.
Well-Worn Prayer Book.examine_text: The book is old and careworn, its pages yellowed by time. Despite its age, you see a certain tenderness in the way the Father carves his fingers through the pages, as each page carries centuries of wisdom and contemplation. Small annotations in Father Moris's handwriting crowd the margins, a testament to his thoughtful and dedicated study.

Bunch of Keys to the Temple Rooms.name: Bunch of Keys to the Temple Rooms
Bunch of Keys to the Temple Rooms.description: A set of keys that unlock various rooms of the Sacred Temple.
Bunch of Keys to the Temple Rooms.examine_text: The keys are old but polished from frequent use. There are multiple keys, each varying in size and shape. As the church has many rooms, each of the key pertains to a room that houses sacred artifacts, practices, and secrets of the Sacred Temple, kept under the care of Father Moris.

Sister Annette.name: Sister Annette
Sister Annette.description: A middle-aged, stern-looking nun with a kind heart, usually seen with a soft smile on her lips. She always wears a rosary around her neck.
Sister Annette.persona: I have given my life to servitude and find meaning through the vows I took. It brings me joy to see the temple full of worshipers.
Sister Annette.goal: Her goal is to maintain peace and order in the Sacred Temple.

rosary.name: Rosary
rosary.description: A beautifully crafted rosary with tiny wooden beads strung together.
rosary.examine_text: Upon close inspection, each bead of the rosary is carved with painstaking care. It feels smooth to the touch, each bead worn from years of prayer. The cross at the end of the rosary is worn but still depicts the image of Jesus clearly.

old_hymn_book.name: Old Hymn Book
old_hymn_book.description: An ancient hymn book, its pages yellowed and slightly brittle from age.
old_hymn_book.examine_text: As you open the hymn book, the pages crackle under your touch. You see handwritten notes scrawled in the margins, old ink faded but legible. The hymns are written in a beautiful script, indicating they could be hundreds of years old. The book smells faintly of incense and age.

Elias.name: Elias
Elias.description: Elias is a young, passionate artist with sparkling eyes and a sketch book in his hand. He had been given the task to restore the temple's aged frescoes.
Elias.persona: I find inspiration in the sacred art that surrounds us all and hope to bring these ancient images to life once more.
Elias.goal: He is determined to restore the frescoes in a way that will impress the townsfolk.

Sketchpad.name: Sketchpad
Sketchpad.description: A leather-bound sketchpad that Elias carries around, filled with blank pages waiting to be filled with images and ideas.
Sketchpad.examine_text: The leather cover of the Sketchpad shows signs of wear, testament to its regular usage. Within, blank pages are smooth and thick, perfect for capturing the vibrant colors of Elias's paints. His name is etched in the corner of the cover in elegant, loopy script.

Set of Paint Brushes.name: Set of Paint Brushes
Set of Paint Brushes.description: A set of well-used brushes of all sizes in a leather roll-up kit.
Set of Paint Brushes.examine_text: Every brush in the set speaks volumes about Elias's dedication to his craft. They vary in size from one suited for wide, loose strokes to a fine tipped brush ideal for precise detailing. Stains of paints from previous sessions still cling to the bristles, adding a colorful history to an otherwise basic tool.

Small Box of Paint.name: Small Box of Paint
Small Box of Paint.description: A compact wooden box containing a variety of paints.
Small Box of Paint.examine_text: The wooden box is small and easy to carry around, but contains an impressive array of paint tubes. Each color is vibrant and rich, from deep indigos to bright yellows. The box itself is stained with dried paint smeared in an almost artistic chaos during the rush of creativity.

locations.name: The Confession Box
locations.description: It's a simple little confession box with a window where you can talk to the priest. The seat it wooden and lined with golden trim. The Window is covered by a golden cloth with a dragon on it.
locations.background: This church is where all confess to the priest about their wrong doings. It is the center of the kingdom of Dark Thorn. The church is Thousands of years old and still stand for the just good of god. The confession box is one of many in the church.

Wooden Chair.name: Wooden Chair
Wooden Chair.description: A simple wooden chair lined with golden trim.
Wooden Chair.examine_text: It is an old, wooden chair slightly polished with wear and the passage of time with a touch of sparkle from the golden lining.

Golden Cloth.name: Golden Cloth
Golden Cloth.description: A golden cloth with a dragon on it covering the window to the priest's chamber.
Golden Cloth.examine_text: As you approach, you realize it's a beautifully intricate piece of cloth. It's woven from golden thread and depicts a mighty dragon in the middle.

Window.name: Window
Window.description: A small window that offers a glimpse into the priest's chamber.
Window.examine_text: On closer examination, one notes the window is just right for viewing. It is shaded by the golden cloth, making any confessions an anonymous affair.

Father Bartholomew.name: Father Bartholomew
Father Bartholomew.description: An elderly priest with a kind face, Father Bartholomew is dressed in traditional priest's robes. His eyes, although aged, carry a gleam of youthful vigor and understanding.
Father Bartholomew.persona: Sometimes burdened by the weight of others' sins, I remain steadfast. Through God, I offer solace and advice to the troubled souls of Dark Thorn.
Father Bartholomew.goal: To guide his flock and provide comfort to the sinners.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A strand of small round beads used for keeping count in repetitive prayer.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: A long string of small round beads. The cord holding them together is slightly worn but sturdy. The beads are smooth and cool to the touch, a comfort in troubling times.

Holy Bible.name: Holy Bible
Holy Bible.description: A holy scripture sacred to the religion.
Holy Bible.examine_text: A thick book, the cover is made of leather and the pages are worn from Father Bartholomew's countless readings. The words of wisdom provide peace and understanding. The cover is embossed with a large, gold cross.

Crucifix.name: Crucifix
Crucifix.description: A representation of Jesus on the cross.
Crucifix.examine_text: A large crucifix hanging on the wall of the confession box. It is worn but it still shines with a holy light covering it. The details on it are artisanal, exhibiting the painstaking craftsmanship of an ancient time.

Sir Reginald.name: Sir Reginald
Sir Reginald.description: A seasoned knight with an intimidating presence. Sir Reginald is covered in a suit of ornately-decorated armor and noticeably bears the scars of past conflicts.
Sir Reginald.persona: My past, painted with the colors of battles, finds solace here. Though I am a knight, I too, seek absolution for my actions.
Sir Reginald.goal: To find peace for his past actions and deeds.

Knights Templar Cross.name: Knights Templar Cross
Knights Templar Cross.description: A small, worn cross of a Templar knight. The cross seems to emanate a calm aura.
Knights Templar Cross.examine_text: Upon closer look, the cross appears to be very old yet well-maintained. The cross is made of silver, with intricately engraved symbols that embody the Knights Templar. You can feel a sense of calming divinity emanating from it.

Dusty Gauntlets.name: Dusty Gauntlets
Dusty Gauntlets.description: A pair of old, dusty gauntlets that seem to have been worn in many battles.
Dusty Gauntlets.examine_text: The gauntlets are made of heavy iron individually forged pieces. They have seen many battles, as evidenced by the numerous dents and scratches. Despite the dust, their craftsmanship is evident. They were certainly made for a knight of importance.

Lady Eveline.name: Lady Eveline
Lady Eveline.description: A regal noblewoman in her mid-thirties, Lady Eveline is discernible by her elaborate gowns and the aura of mystique that surrounds her.
Lady Eveline.persona: I am not as pious as they believe. Here, I confess my guilts, few visible, many hidden. It brings me some solace, but peace...still evades.
Lady Eveline.goal: To find peace with herself and reconcile with her past.

delicately embroidered handkerchief.name: Delicately Embroidered Handkerchief
delicately embroidered handkerchief.description: A finely made handkerchief with intricate embroideries.
delicately embroidered handkerchief.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the handkerchief appears to be of expensive silk, bearing intricate thread work depicting a series of well concealed symbols and letters. Its scent faintly suggests a regal perfume apparently worn by a lady of nobility.

small vial of perfume.name: Small Vial of Perfume
small vial of perfume.description: A small crystal vial carrying the scent of exotic flowers
small vial of perfume.examine_text: The vial is tiny, yet heavy, suggesting it is filled with an essence intense enough to mask any deceit. Its scent, a mix of flowers and spices, is alluring, almost intoxicating, certainly befitting a lady of considerable standing.
